kwargs.question: whats the current state of llm driven science discovery????

expected:
The period of 2024-2025 has seen a significant evolution in the application of Large Language Models (LLMs) within scientific discovery, marking a shift from merely increasing model size to focusing on efficiency, specialization, and responsible development [vamsitalkstech](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQESaLacgJ1A9IeTheFxbE89noDAutdVvWYpmL7_eHrgivRAvYL-1E5qn7UPLuSfAopQTTyBY4ALOrZP01qJXmuFr0yzluZwSewwWh6ScelluQEU2z21Pd5c5Z7MNFG0Xvx-LXEmgOkcH3KkrBL3cXxlH--z5KEudx-5zTwlDxkA1H9SC1G5E1Aw7BDdU_YmabGPOkrFFFpHc5CKjglkJn0SsCdJFcMH-1aCD7JNtKJx7yEw8N4C6cMPKNYJBIHC7ss=) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHmUzjnuLWVJRZMsMzbot4s8TLdtUsVw1r23NBqlNYtfB4l7cKR5CTb3YSGGo6SPIEYD2S__atZPvQOPnfWP825kchfJCh1kFl_6G_kS-uM5mUcW1ptw4S64rHhu1JK-qrah7ou81NHxpHY1hwKWy89nMbkjUKN2LpGz87vRLgL1vXhvleVldbAPCS7KQBWGoCRjfSFNIqddpgUa20gz0Mla2ERoIqf5kkYNSDjITw=). LLMs are increasingly integrated across the entire scientific research lifecycle, from hypothesis generation and data analysis to the drafting of research papers [psychologytoday](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEtfxQNjkWryqxvlMvHMwgHabD1qKVYCWC7-dJ4POB0NGVexe74Wx-iO0jqwiNzb0S52ubgRWkMBH7gBt-6Mznr0TS0KOLESkt4UT9WTGxJ4JOj7JuMXnc1gu0WW4mtNHbSTid3bDGXz1WiZV6fLULRXXCdAtL2C2wwF1MZIdmOlMCLcVtXvhxYlsyJvata2nNacs1HGw2FtfaM5thnk4M6USKldZHom8VF-YJ46Gga-OzG_uc=) [weforum](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQG74ZKFvn5P10WqaWbIkHhbQcuubhJPpg16jNPCDCM-RKchdzO21ekYYxevWzqd2mpfh6mi3YxTf__OFAJPLjWYs-Fn17jz0Emb7ktnYYevU2XPmBDLqSMxapLNGvM4IXhuw_C4vyPe1bWDIR9v968VDUhIIZEh52CvREz9IjwTt8GTiuLf0e-aA7B7edKkuF1orLPQjxLqq-1dClxgJAuBjn5ZZ67I-4M=) [msd](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGe6NeW5jsJ3z67vbXG5AQoBqse0hskPKoSq9O0avgYANFOidRbIT2MPoAPlLo7IHB7VIiuskglGsluNbFjoIsWOj2fFhFk5-LSORJNXSMQNKGvkdnyDBB00Pz0fnjY4ae1myYUY6AjmqpbxOspuSEUh7oDq_htLPqSK8iIjCpJHuzZy49OXMfsjLkFpDEhNRvA1DhQnpjkqE34QGxphP7KuFxH2ZA=).

**Key Advancements and Trends:**

*   **Efficiency and Specialization:** The focus is moving beyond massive model scale towards developing smaller, more efficient LLMs capable of running on devices with limited resources [turing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQElqIP2Q3K5F1y_kV7xDAYcg4hMwOd0ytr98ZCry3ztRKvn64NyLWkD9gjgR-6KHUH4uyFVC9C3W2f6Zc09fQI4G0_BDxOKyDuKo6WqKV-NcfKKYES6_QmBTfwyt3ovh4d5dJRjXem1_34m) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHmUzjnuLWVJRZMsMzbot4s8TLdtUsVw1r23NBqlNYtfB4l7cKR5CTb3YSGGo6SPIEYD2S__atZPvQOPnfWP825kchfJCh1kFl_6G_kS-uM5mUcW1ptw4S64rHhu1JK-qrah7ou81NHxpHY1hwKWy89nMbkjUKN2LpGz87vRLgL1vXhvleVldbAPCS7KQBWGoCRjfSFNIqddpgUa20gz0Mla2ERoIqf5kkYNSDjITw=). Specialized LLMs are being developed for specific scientific domains to enhance accuracy and relevance [obot](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHlSypBjWhNiEQEocKKhWKXJA0HShErBJ66_6Tl4Hpd_NhsBJ7s6GBQNB_5lbuWvs8ySSIGJyk1yrnf94TpJQm7hjOV2O2Xz_PgWM-mTgTxCjTe0zdA00nwcb9MbKVhzpU71vKiM1T1soLGftrFIw7f486Q0sU=).
*   **Multimodal Capabilities:** LLMs are increasingly processing and generating content across various data types, including text, images, audio, and video, which enhances their ability to interact with complex scientific data [aimultiple](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQG69J8fAQ28qIh3UokFvEIlXmh793S8S7-L6ZsxRkgkoSyPCO4ZAd2uxqmo-96E1q9ViscrB7678SIFzVKi9X_zW9iyqxAZFo579_AZNeLEhXlR3Oo9JDl627G0LziBzQ8YWKSz3OdI0TTyxk-nk_SK5qs18vJ2XJQ_9Is=) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHmUzjnuLWVJRZMsMzbot4s8TLdtUsVw1r23NBqlNYtfB4l7cKR5CTb3YSGGo6SPIEYD2S__atZPvQOPnfWP825kchfJCh1kFl_6G_kS-uM5mUcW1ptw4S64rHhu1JK-qrah7ou81NHxpHY1hwKWy89nMbkjUKN2LpGz87vRLgL1vXhvleVldbAPCS7KQBWGoCRjfSFNIqddpgUa20gz0Mla2ERoIqf5kkYNSDjITw=).
*   **Agentic AI:** The development of autonomous agents powered by LLMs is a significant trend, enabling automated decision-making and task execution without constant human input [turing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQElqIP2Q3K5F1y_kV7xDAYcg4hMwOd0ytr98ZCry3ztRKvn64NyLWkD9gjgR-6KHUH4uyFVC9C3W2f6Zc09fQI4G0_BDxOKyDuKo6WqKV-NcfKKYES6_QmBTfwyt3ovh4d5dJRjXem1_34m) [msd](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGe6NeW5jsJ3z67vbXG5AQoBqse0hskPKoSq9O0avgYANFOidRbIT2MPoAPlLo7IHB7VIiuskglGsluNbFjoIsWOj2fFhFk5-LSORJNXSMQNKGvkdnyDBB00Pz0fnjY4ae1myYUY6AjmqpbxOspuSEUh7oDq_htLPqSK8iIjCpJHuzZy49OXMfsjLkFpDEhNRvA1DhQnpjkqE34QGxphP7KuFxH2ZA=) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHmUzjnuLWVJRZMsMzbot4s8TLdtUsVw1r23NBqlNYtfB4l7cKR5CTb3YSGGo6SPIEYD2S__atZPvQOPnfWP825kchfJCh1kFl_6G_kS-uM5mUcW1ptw4S64rHhu1JK-qrah7ou81NHxpHY1hwKWy89nMbkjUKN2LpGz87vRLgL1vXhvleVldbAPCS7KQBWGoCRjfSFNIqddpgUa20gz0Mla2ERoIqf5kkYNSDjITw=).

**Applications Across Scientific Domains:**

*   **Drug Discovery and Development:** LLMs are revolutionizing this field by aiding in target identification, molecular design, and drug repurposing [eurekalert](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHPvbgT7tfzMsltoBF3mmSOaJFhYvjvzjBbYtiBBdIEMfRvbvtWdEiGIuSZuGGqcqQyXGnBZVtT8ibct-n5mGjfPrDFZJJpL6Bi1TK1xz2UGTDFeQ4FQT4SR2wMpTmL_TfU8MeHzNOpWdltmQ==) [nih](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFL5MGI0egsXGqPKiKr2hBgdLw8unjFPMsCOtvwB4lm_v8CU76nQgOeXrfKnlS6TKj6XWv2pAko9aAeMnK_b32L5RI2CthUhpdEePSUwZ8WdmWxatvvONH_yeP61umi9FQ4lY8fnqse8r9sKA4x) [foley](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGJvgnP7eCFKwHofZbuhyFlbhnb19BcSMzhzQqDy_CY_eBEUX-XdUV0l8eCdn-elYqEJbcZqjaaHJuJwX9ZZ5BUSb1wOhZqgqRQVGxOZQRntLGVpnHF4Aiqz4PexqIRzjuSqYgS8CZ7VAth35YHySKwD3t4CEWaznvYPW6SNb4Gdo0F6komXM7eZrUDmFPl).
*   **Materials Science and Chemistry:** LLMs are employed for molecular property prediction, material design, and automating scientific workflows through specialized tools and hackathons [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHmUzjnuLWVJRZMsMzbot4s8TLdtUsVw1r23NBqlNYtfB4l7cKR5CTb3YSGGo6SPIEYD2S__atZPvQOPnfWP825kchfJCh1kFl_6G_kS-uM5mUcW1ptw4S64rHhu1JK-qrah7ou81NHxpHY1hwKWy89nMbkjUKN2LpGz87vRLgL1vXhvleVldbAPCS7KQBWGoCRjfSFNIqddpgUa20gz0Mla2ERoIqf5kkYNSDjITw=0) [purdue](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHmUzjnuLWVJRZMsMzbot4s8TLdtUsVw1r23NBqlNYtfB4l7cKR5CTb3YSGGo6SPIEYD2S__atZPvQOPnfWP825kchfJCh1kFl_6G_kS-uM5mUcW1ptw4S64rHhu1JK-qrah7ou81NHxpHY1hwKWy89nMbkjUKN2LpGz87vRLgL1vXhvleVldbAPCS7KQBWGoCRjfSFNIqddpgUa20gz0Mla2ERoIqf5kkYNSDjITw=1) [github](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHmUzjnuLWVJRZMsMzbot4s8TLdtUsVw1r23NBqlNYtfB4l7cKR5CTb3YSGGo6SPIEYD2S__atZPvQOPnfWP825kchfJCh1kFl_6G_kS-uM5mUcW1ptw4S64rHhu1JK-qrah7ou81NHxpHY1hwKWy89nMbkjUKN2LpGz87vRLgL1vXhvleVldbAPCS7KQBWGoCRjfSFNIqddpgUa20gz0Mla2ERoIqf5kkYNSDjITw=2) [pyiron](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHmUzjnuLWVJRZMsMzbot4s8TLdtUsVw1r23NBqlNYtfB4l7cKR5CTb3YSGGo6SPIEYD2S__atZPvQOPnfWP825kchfJCh1kFl_6G_kS-uM5mUcW1ptw4S64rHhu1JK-qrah7ou81NHxpHY1hwKWy89nMbkjUKN2LpGz87vRLgL1vXhvleVldbAPCS7KQBWGoCRjfSFNIqddpgUa20gz0Mla2ERoIqf5kkYNSDjITw=3).
*   **Neuroscience and Psychology:** LLMs are used for analyzing complex biological data from brain imaging and exploring the convergence of LLM processing with human brain activity [psychologytoday](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEtfxQNjkWryqxvlMvHMwgHabD1qKVYCWC7-dJ4POB0NGVexe74Wx-iO0jqwiNzb0S52ubgRWkMBH7gBt-6Mznr0TS0KOLESkt4UT9WTGxJ4JOj7JuMXnc1gu0WW4mtNHbSTid3bDGXz1WiZV6fLULRXXCdAtL2C2wwF1MZIdmOlMCLcVtXvhxYlsyJvata2nNacs1HGw2FtfaM5thnk4M6USKldZHom8VF-YJ46Gga-OzG_uc=) [psychologytoday](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHmUzjnuLWVJRZMsMzbot4s8TLdtUsVw1r23NBqlNYtfB4l7cKR5CTb3YSGGo6SPIEYD2S__atZPvQOPnfWP825kchfJCh1kFl_6G_kS-uM5mUcW1ptw4S64rHhu1JK-qrah7ou81NHxpHY1hwKWy89nMbkjUKN2LpGz87vRLgL1vXhvleVldbAPCS7KQBWGoCRjfSFNIqddpgUa20gz0Mla2ERoIqf5kkYNSDjITw=4).
*   **Life Sciences and Healthcare:** AI, including LLMs, is transforming drug discovery, genomics, personalized medicine, and diagnostics [nih](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFvJdOb0cLrHwXI0qbNwV7oI0KCYOXuPJFdA-fVMx1SWfQnYunXsGD-PvhpZXqIvM6NjdnB-NYwwKNBAMMfiWe0H9IrbqqnID2--8l95JSfeQZvx9uy1BrZfl5Rsokzhn8AVWPUqRcE83dbF01O) [techtimes](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQF46LouwQRMR_zBtJ5p2FThFTkJGFn__tR_3KV9yUJ2lut5YCKHLvgfOu37_EDA6de3jaNrX-BdvNpkhOfREleq61m2g9S_wC68THsN9s7YQUORC_oKJV7OrQV01p-8H7Xo1Bu56du_YaPElHdZePvlGb91mLz0NzDZ_ghsz6CmGN4Ne1RjzCafMcNtQUwwmuaxWbFnX5s8yt-8lYabQrDZIx5gNsOyJnkbN8Ssj7Z2bCZoW6z5YR4qXAbUabB89g1YZF0J).
*   **Climate Science and Environmental Research:** AI enhances climate modeling, prediction, and wildfire detection [semiprofound](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEAWSle3pU-tRZnJ7-nrd_RFqwtSF0Pi0FvDtJGj43qfhl3W4qov4sZaiDOr0caD3KEdT2QSo_I3GGybeT0da7fX-f8G0WnW_47tmBWKA_qF2BXiBgioGYiZr-ElABYgKZ_3GqgF082Z-MzzTyXiWUWXABTiLQT6N0koXfDPA==) [brainforge](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEz4oUqp0MpjqfhFICPknqMANaLtcIWtfpXa5UbiYCKv3pdKr3XNpymDERFIk4rXWuRt_utYHhWLj8RJV6l4dp4n_-MrwIbs5yn5Hq0cQmx8qWdS4jBnF4ffr_VmCkTwg22TsBjpHwhVDlCiDYYRRyJC78T46z1Ue7lVUQsW0RZFL7hrieV6n9KF_-xy32GZ8hmJy8j-aUn4n9qushwO0D29WeFCXdf7ZwvGw==).

**Enhancing Scientific Workflows:**

*   **Hypothesis Generation:** LLMs are showing significant potential in generating novel scientific hypotheses, though challenges with factual accuracy and bias persist [aclanthology](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHmUzjnuLWVJRZMsMzbot4s8TLdtUsVw1r23NBqlNYtfB4l7cKR5CTb3YSGGo6SPIEYD2S__atZPvQOPnfWP825kchfJCh1kFl_6G_kS-uM5mUcW1ptw4S64rHhu1JK-qrah7ou81NHxpHY1hwKWy89nMbkjUKN2LpGz87vRLgL1vXhvleVldbAPCS7KQBWGoCRjfSFNIqddpgUa20gz0Mla2ERoIqf5kkYNSDjITw=5) [royalsocietypublishing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHmUzjnuLWVJRZMsMzbot4s8TLdtUsVw1r23NBqlNYtfB4l7cKR5CTb3YSGGo6SPIEYD2S__atZPvQOPnfWP825kchfJCh1kFl_6G_kS-uM5mUcW1ptw4S64rHhu1JK-qrah7ou81NHxpHY1hwKWy89nMbkjUKN2LpGz87vRLgL1vXhvleVldbAPCS7KQBWGoCRjfSFNIqddpgUa20gz0Mla2ERoIqf5kkYNSDjITw=6). Specialized benchmarks like ScienceAgentBench and ResearchBench are being developed to evaluate these capabilities [mindplex](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQF6pctmmoVDcIXSZ6HOA1iUMEekGXiWsaICVvViutgMEDhz8IYgnJC4cv9J1icI56xx1MQdHSiN2gbODNtc7CTvWiWBOeVBlh9GPCTPnGnrS-OpeW0x-n7FCRcgnqOq6PXAjHPkvprSP-eokz5f4TYcfn0uzK9dqmhGKbF13I0cIn_aGNL7BI3QlKwtBv-QpXFlOKvViLRcU3iz8SP2vR1Giwz_mt0=) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQE5eu1gEKdp5LCbStc9akGw4SIrgQMiIiuKxY3hDUpNAkW9_RJHdMhAtXUyj4cv24EQG6e3GGv3nza14eZWE3bhgLiZ1Hnfy13MarIrCUHI7z61aqtupk4DzeEwg6XB).
*   **Research Assistants and Automation:** LLMs serve as research assistants for information gathering, data analysis, and writing. AI agents and LLM-integrated platforms are streamlining lab workflows and automating repetitive tasks [psychologytoday](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEtfxQNjkWryqxvlMvHMwgHabD1qKVYCWC7-dJ4POB0NGVexe74Wx-iO0jqwiNzb0S52ubgRWkMBH7gBt-6Mznr0TS0KOLESkt4UT9WTGxJ4JOj7JuMXnc1gu0WW4mtNHbSTid3bDGXz1WiZV6fLULRXXCdAtL2C2wwF1MZIdmOlMCLcVtXvhxYlsyJvata2nNacs1HGw2FtfaM5thnk4M6USKldZHom8VF-YJ46Gga-OzG_uc=) [weforum](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQG74ZKFvn5P10WqaWbIkHhbQcuubhJPpg16jNPCDCM-RKchdzO21ekYYxevWzqd2mpfh6mi3YxTf__OFAJPLjWYs-Fn17jz0Emb7ktnYYevU2XPmBDLqSMxapLNGvM4IXhuw_C4vyPe1bWDIR9v968VDUhIIZEh52CvREz9IjwTt8GTiuLf0e-aA7B7edKkuF1orLPQjxLqq-1dClxgJAuBjn5ZZ67I-4M=) [rdworldonline](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEtfxQNjkWryqxvlMvHMwgHabD1qKVYCWC7-dJ4POB0NGVexe74Wx-iO0jqwiNzb0S52ubgRWkMBH7gBt-6Mznr0TS0KOLESkt4UT9WTGxJ4JOj7JuMXnc1gu0WW4mtNHbSTid3bDGXz1WiZV6fLULRXXCdAtL2C2wwF1MZIdmOlMCLcVtXvhxYlsyJvata2nNacs1HGw2FtfaM5thnk4M6USKldZHom8VF-YJ46Gga-OzG_uc=0) [msd](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGe6NeW5jsJ3z67vbXG5AQoBqse0hskPKoSq9O0avgYANFOidRbIT2MPoAPlLo7IHB7VIiuskglGsluNbFjoIsWOj2fFhFk5-LSORJNXSMQNKGvkdnyDBB00Pz0fnjY4ae1myYUY6AjmqpbxOspuSEUh7oDq_htLPqSK8iIjCpJHuzZy49OXMfsjLkFpDEhNRvA1DhQnpjkqE34QGxphP7KuFxH2ZA=).
*   **Data Analysis and Interpretation:** LLMs are used to consolidate scientific knowledge, analyze literature, automate data cleaning, preprocessing, and perform qualitative and quantitative analysis [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGJOTDOXLc-Mxim-xfCfzZ9xfMuhH6MLLTiR0bPstE9hk-lkyFfAJBypldNLnT6-_iwP9ukPHblNFREyWQrYKEhPBEcSb47M4rzgxbO99D_SNWvgzkk5iifD0U6shUhzzKAhAIWQ2ykJRqr10YBP_uGJxOpxDoz6FvymsqDqM3aKYJkBS-BiZ362FdcXlrJas9CF7fQEFbPVpkRSZss1z5V5LgpvDwocVay_urk4QDNnhFr) [summaverse](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEq9qDzwuBGc1WOn8S646LGrP1JrHlapBCSPb6agBHP0gkOoIJSXvdHmWESRijeQY5l16I201M23yk14RaaygINn1anS0a_AliLarDqyd4WQMx6ZbZeOaV4FB5KdaXOWkw2egzgnmR8TbN0JifV2ulscQoYa5cTkrOXoAG6Z--du_qPkVQwHa4H_LGJLzvz1Q==) [binadox](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEIKrF4iotiU-HwZ8UYQrh4bCsuSwk8F6sRFoMBWNUffsYiBTTIm-QNGyeHfXlGEUlp0QHlflHufjg5SwYmZNae2eWBBBGHXl16u2OGHustWCJzshl7TNovCGSjKwdKOCb0R9uv8FU9EgHX3MTUO8DaPBn8QJx8PO5YZ4oKZQC9ln88DdPwysQEUq87GqvkKSW3Piw=).

**Challenges and Ethical Considerations:**

*   **Data Quality and Bias:** The quality and diversity of training data are critical, and biases within this data can be amplified by LLMs [cas](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEtfxQNjkWryqxvlMvHMwgHabD1qKVYCWC7-dJ4POB0NGVexe74Wx-iO0jqwiNzb0S52ubgRWkMBH7gBt-6Mznr0TS0KOLESkt4UT9WTGxJ4JOj7JuMXnc1gu0WW4mtNHbSTid3bDGXz1WiZV6fLULRXXCdAtL2C2wwF1MZIdmOlMCLcVtXvhxYlsyJvata2nNacs1HGw2FtfaM5thnk4M6USKldZHom8VF-YJ46Gga-OzG_uc=1) [thinkml](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQF--xDO7YYDvp_RT4gu9dFsF7_4GhcHhu65rzjPNu4_P6fbzdXikXjrRsyX_zIza0wIsYyJ8Z-de_R1pYZJmpEksJxpzhk6oTuH0uHOoEGOLHW6ngiNfZy99PENF4-LWpE=0).
*   **Interpretability and Reliability:** Making LLMs more transparent and reliable remains a key research priority [vamsitalkstech](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQESaLacgJ1A9IeTheFxbE89noDAutdVvWYpmL7_eHrgivRAvYL-1E5qn7UPLuSfAopQTTyBY4ALOrZP01qJXmuFr0yzluZwSewwWh6ScelluQEU2z21Pd5c5Z7MNFG0Xvx-LXEmgOkcH3KkrBL3cXxlH--z5KEudx-5zTwlDxkA1H9SC1G5E1Aw7BDdU_YmabGPOkrFFFpHc5CKjglkJn0SsCdJFcMH-1aCD7JNtKJx7yEw8N4C6cMPKNYJBIHC7ss=). LLMs can generate inaccurate information or "hallucinate," requiring critical appraisal and human oversight [computer](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEq9qDzwuBGc1WOn8S646LGrP1JrHlapBCSPb6agBHP0gkOoIJSXvdHmWESRijeQY5l16I201M23yk14RaaygINn1anS0a_AliLarDqyd4WQMx6ZbZeOaV4FB5KdaXOWkw2egzgnmR8TbN0JifV2ulscQoYa5cTkrOXoAG6Z--du_qPkVQwHa4H_LGJLzvz1Q==1).
*   **Ethical and Privacy Concerns:** Issues surrounding bias, accuracy, toxicity, patient privacy, intellectual property, and the potential for misinformation are paramount [weforum](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQG74ZKFvn5P10WqaWbIkHhbQcuubhJPpg16jNPCDCM-RKchdzO21ekYYxevWzqd2mpfh6mi3YxTf__OFAJPLjWYs-Fn17jz0Emb7ktnYYevU2XPmBDLqSMxapLNGvM4IXhuw_C4vyPe1bWDIR9v968VDUhIIZEh52CvREz9IjwTt8GTiuLf0e-aA7B7edKkuF1orLPQjxLqq-1dClxgJAuBjn5ZZ67I-4M=) [eurekalert](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHPvbgT7tfzMsltoBF3mmSOaJFhYvjvzjBbYtiBBdIEMfRvbvtWdEiGIuSZuGGqcqQyXGnBZVtT8ibct-n5mGjfPrDFZJJpL6Bi1TK1xz2UGTDFeQ4FQT4SR2wMpTmL_TfU8MeHzNOpWdltmQ==).
*   **Technical Integration Challenges:** Integrating LLMs into existing scientific data infrastructure involves challenges related to data privacy, security, interoperability, scalability, and data governance [scirp](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFRnA3UzvHg4T0g1pCp1ELuwj2aw3SVAmmJOa0xTlyjpOJSOfWj1Y__n3g-vi55b6g22sN7XWiFMqOp_srmedz-3OQdLlB5ooxUYMel_XULWkGYL-ACwNv5xkCI8pwtoEAOubHGMlwFE-aXZJm6qpev8dif5NzvMQ==) [thinkml](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQF--xDO7YYDvp_RT4gu9dFsF7_4GhcHhu65rzjPNu4_P6fbzdXikXjrRsyX_zIza0wIsYyJ8Z-de_R1pYZJmpEksJxpzhk6oTuH0uHOoEGOLHW6ngiNfZy99PENF4-LWpE=0).
*   **Computational Cost and Sustainability:** Reducing the computational and environmental impact of LLMs is an ongoing focus [vamsitalkstech](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQESaLacgJ1A9IeTheFxbE89noDAutdVvWYpmL7_eHrgivRAvYL-1E5qn7UPLuSfAopQTTyBY4ALOrZP01qJXmuFr0yzluZwSewwWh6ScelluQEU2z21Pd5c5Z7MNFG0Xvx-LXEmgOkcH3KkrBL3cXxlH--z5KEudx-5zTwlDxkA1H9SC1G5E1Aw7BDdU_YmabGPOkrFFFpHc5CKjglkJn0SsCdJFcMH-1aCD7JNtKJx7yEw8N4C6cMPKNYJBIHC7ss=) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHmUzjnuLWVJRZMsMzbot4s8TLdtUsVw1r23NBqlNYtfB4l7cKR5CTb3YSGGo6SPIEYD2S__atZPvQOPnfWP825kchfJCh1kFl_6G_kS-uM5mUcW1ptw4S64rHhu1JK-qrah7ou81NHxpHY1hwKWy89nMbkjUKN2LpGz87vRLgL1vXhvleVldbAPCS7KQBWGoCRjfSFNIqddpgUa20gz0Mla2ERoIqf5kkYNSDjITw=).

**Evolving Methodologies:**

*   **Fine-tuning:** Various methods are used to adapt LLMs for scientific domains, including full fine-tuning, parameter-efficient fine-tuning (PEFT), and continual pre-training [obot](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHlSypBjWhNiEQEocKKhWKXJA0HShErBJ66_6Tl4Hpd_NhsBJ7s6GBQNB_5lbuWvs8ySSIGJyk1yrnf94TpJQm7hjOV2O2Xz_PgWM-mTgTxCjTe0zdA00nwcb9MbKVhzpU71vKiM1T1soLGftrFIw7f486Q0sU=) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHYpugFEvyY78fJb2-DBTiafPoPMtTnGEuX5AGC9FU_E3ursu8RAdmxSK3Pbm3m0Z8GnXXg3DRZ_J1nQMBm80qhnnw1hrmUSPUJT0RSz-LZrB5mcwpals4UtUDb_Q8C).
*   **Prompt Engineering and Human-AI Collaboration:** Best practices emphasize clear, iterative prompting, advanced techniques like Chain-of-Thought, and a collaborative approach where AI augments human insight. Prompt engineering is becoming a systematic discipline essential for reliable LLM use [dev](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHtZiYNWb_A2eMxoUOI3mwhR5WZFy406SONJ9R_cbgalClApYD4nnoxQF4nGm1tuKBmuhwV3gKgheD-8gUXOlWXgrSmAKjEZlqTdD8Vn8knFctWpEMEDcmqdT2sbQix35TRbEkszRQxFHj3nHSV3AXv5kUV_MofkizAm-Sf3w-W1Y4o7-5n2ueyS8fvw9GQWfaKX7X5bws_kzmNk7q3RgdVqA==) [research](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHexDezz9Hsdm49y-siZv2_IH-uhB07gs2QYjS3q-QSza8jgwZoEeXpOctKZuwHqibR0qmQoVKYCArH2wTzNWY2Ws1zRyg2j59OtilXGNyiCwkydo19rTbh6E_DCMmeZO8jMBywbiMNCBjQS_XsmWUBrIqHt2-gaEyIqoyA0-ye-vrnj7wfk08lB_5Acnn8oA5sc0Te5V-sVPy5XF1TpAA0Uv2Z7s4I7ag1fg==).

The trend towards more efficient, specialized, and multimodal LLMs, coupled with their increasing integration into scientific workflows, suggests a future where AI plays an even more pivotal role in accelerating scientific discovery [vamsitalkstech](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQESaLacgJ1A9IeTheFxbE89noDAutdVvWYpmL7_eHrgivRAvYL-1E5qn7UPLuSfAopQTTyBY4ALOrZP01qJXmuFr0yzluZwSewwWh6ScelluQEU2z21Pd5c5Z7MNFG0Xvx-LXEmgOkcH3KkrBL3cXxlH--z5KEudx-5zTwlDxkA1H9SC1G5E1Aw7BDdU_YmabGPOkrFFFpHc5CKjglkJn0SsCdJFcMH-1aCD7JNtKJx7yEw8N4C6cMPKNYJBIHC7ss=) [aimultiple](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQG69J8fAQ28qIh3UokFvEIlXmh793S8S7-L6ZsxRkgkoSyPCO4ZAd2uxqmo-96E1q9ViscrB7678SIFzVKi9X_zW9iyqxAZFo579_AZNeLEhXlR3Oo9JDl627G0LziBzQ8YWKSz3OdI0TTyxk-nk_SK5qs18vJ2XJQ_9Is=) [turing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQElqIP2Q3K5F1y_kV7xDAYcg4hMwOd0ytr98ZCry3ztRKvn64NyLWkD9gjgR-6KHUH4uyFVC9C3W2f6Zc09fQI4G0_BDxOKyDuKo6WqKV-NcfKKYES6_QmBTfwyt3ovh4d5dJRjXem1_34m) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHmUzjnuLWVJRZMsMzbot4s8TLdtUsVw1r23NBqlNYtfB4l7cKR5CTb3YSGGo6SPIEYD2S__atZPvQOPnfWP825kchfJCh1kFl_6G_kS-uM5mUcW1ptw4S64rHhu1JK-qrah7ou81NHxpHY1hwKWy89nMbkjUKN2LpGz87vRLgL1vXhvleVldbAPCS7KQBWGoCRjfSFNIqddpgUa20gz0Mla2ERoIqf5kkYNSDjITw=).

code.doc: Main LLM-facing entrypoint for the research agent. Wrapped with @eval so calls are traced/stored.
code.signature: (question: str, initial_queries: int = 3, max_loops: int = 2, reasoning_model: str = 'gemini-2.5-flash-lite') -> str
code.source:
@eval(name="research_agent")
def run_agent(question: str, initial_queries: int = 3, max_loops: int = 2, reasoning_model: str = "gemini-2.5-flash-lite") -> str:
    """
    Main LLM-facing entrypoint for the research agent. Wrapped with @eval so calls are traced/stored.
    """
    state = {
        "messages": [HumanMessage(content=question)],
        "initial_search_query_count": initial_queries,
        "max_research_loops": max_loops,
        "reasoning_model": reasoning_model,
    }
    result = graph.invoke(state)
    messages = result.get("messages", [])
    return messages[-1].content if messages else ""

kwargs.question: whats the current state of llm driven science discovery????

expected:
The current state of LLM-driven science discovery in December 2025 is characterized by rapid advancements and transformative impacts across various scientific disciplines. LLMs are proving instrumental in accelerating research by automating tedious tasks, enhancing data analysis, fostering interdisciplinary collaboration, and even generating novel hypotheses. However, alongside these breakthroughs, significant ethical considerations and challenges are being addressed.

**Key Areas of Impact and Advancement:**

*   **Drug Discovery and Development:** LLMs are streamlining the entire drug discovery pipeline, from understanding disease mechanisms and designing drug molecules to predicting efficacy and safety, and facilitating clinical trials [frontiersin](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFHhrjFz_2zqx6fomvJZipSCeiMFVrE9vegr2YaSLdeEi8aAAmdPmyVNSrSkSMGuWX2JlHZrRrksKqLGRB-zsO9xhU0NUaoGahb58EemhTKd2pX90PnffYu8twFlEeGTbeh_WRdRQ8viUMnM4vWzRnpfUUXQcuDw-NWb0TuoZCpC8DV5_ItneWB-_UnXQQjCmYe-al7Eg==) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHYMImorf0vexOfzMl5QWS4Ep0ZhbhU7z-H8wr8Qe_Oos1WSETT8h9aCOXs4qFZMNV0nkmfQIW6wWmlcrM2TLiTI8TNJmLschmAsRPwmOGWp6C3y2tpYc5afBxCIZad) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEexIwj6u5rWyMAND7kGhmBQUIHxjePP6MGwkql9WPIMFwRDVJI4gIFuoeFqH-64EisaAVZpbjEFB9xHJJCUpLyG8et71UpfxzH8_xGoTisSrCAEOywSwPB1ePX) [eurekalert](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFu6Eg_E4H1fwsHB0ZL7Nwb29QgJ-sKCVUvhy27yUMDreHQ3n5q4RRdErSfByKsuy7igrkHbgKYP4yIbM0nSIaLzPqB1bQCjXkmqtGcL8SItGXGzyaEMEZ41b7WLNuUl5efvTACnDyyM2dEkQ==). Specialized LLMs are being developed to tackle specific pharmaceutical challenges, aiming to reduce the time and cost associated with bringing new drugs to market [frontiersin](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFHhrjFz_2zqx6fomvJZipSCeiMFVrE9vegr2YaSLdeEi8aAAmdPmyVNSrSkSMGuWX2JlHZrRrksKqLGRB-zsO9xhU0NUaoGahb58EemhTKd2pX90PnffYu8twFlEeGTbeh_WRdRQ8viUMnM4vWzRnpfUUXQcuDw-NWb0TuoZCpC8DV5_ItneWB-_UnXQQjCmYe-al7Eg==) [pymnts](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGyk7z-GTQdSjxJhImKT_UH0Ad1tdC8usnjJXxjQGucwq0IuSWJbWFSar5w1HHJGvjEyUktx1Jo78g3i_pfLbqGB9Vje2iDV4rIEdxk4IEbB1rJ82oNMlWBsDNx09fy9lwdZ_CCCzP59U_2DJQHFu5XC6YOUkQhcfwZV9w1VhYgLqhBeqMX5rcFFj9TtJgGqDnENwLEF37-fXJ9ym4BgaBmghQ-VngTnUWtNzUmJm6xR4NzRjEV3IN4xLFqQdo=). Transformer-based models, in particular, are widely used for chemical structure prediction and drug-target interaction analysis [nih](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQE-uKBI-4-Ny3IR0vLn9_HAziku_vCg8vH4sjGftKIhCkk9bZ4mXmfv2s1u9QdPTAQ_cNHsAjiPY-t47N5MxL6o0di54PbG5HRLSb1PAiK61Jf4UjRWBPFeyGZM8ZoTH0xoLzm3) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGWjy306JTYsrOQsLaedGzuzujzhMM9xcqSgaBUNyZIxbB9kdKqOlr8PL1eQPLEG6XhUHyaKXIb_9rt8YjiWprYFRcJA-V2VK2M_lBzalYssmD8f5Dhr2Q652O86DifYMkCY8BWfnQQppCEDdg2pvoz2v6QI8n9xzXLcoCt_Lczjsr5dyBg6p2oD-OMpUOvHETtyq2VVu8hmUrXMrUTsTW5UNLAOSjcF1430ZIFV9WJDXIKo8S0rQ==) [nih](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGQW4zbfL8ZhMOh0_s_MVqW5jmDKxk3KXrqwIbFGZBdsYwP5MxJyAct7LWLkp2NCzZenIwRn9ihVBn2hwaNoa-FkOu487aqhFz8Nb2hFi5pSoSTNS4usYFr6UG-YyH_Ck_fMlSs).
*   **Materials Science:** LLMs are accelerating the discovery and development of new materials by predicting properties, aiding in design, and generating crystal structures [github](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFQJs-t3d2vGfUzZVVIgDPuKLEp3El8ZxvHtf1mizakT2AS_hMB1_EWaOxDvDs3HnNKXxCIUaEwLrdX6bi1ttFfD2CEwQ47UsfNlQ56UdxxVbTSbsNGkamaOssm3W4Gz-xrhIY=) [rsc](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQF9JZa-O8xpBXC13eEUAmMt3tBoUe8qR7KcKB57eW3yAxu4gu7BGyHDW6i6D69QAqEDv6OjEn3EBUfIV3zH90C64S24s680lvRhKUnXDCsF8kg5zDoiq4akXW_oRNLllWln04bA3txecgvGilFyDK3sk-Z5_5M2Y_ui) [princeton](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHtb9nj7__MpvzL-EnU3gkwb0SjSnHley0jlvNYczxMXNKSgNCUBDQTW875BjoTCs0WJvF-axjFOfkoXaxo_A1eJrxWBxHTHo2yUms8hsO6ectTAw8k9TbVZsjzUZSHWXBQB3ehJFgQQ4-gLGMR0bTibiyYiCIZnFrjLt8BrcUyMxzt5dhl0wWl__dv_Iu5DPugK-0xSZXcHa4SjA7LtgOCosY6WuTgGuwxyTB4J-Iuwr17y6I_) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFbNMnNwTJXJygI57azgSMbBnKDVFHc40Z3Np9L3CWrCBDUxVJ3VPiEI_9R0rCn73nEQmwJvHt6foXIdsY0ZI0KivsoIqqcHTR7qjdVQSa6KOOFm-GmYVHS8J3z). Domain-grounded LLMs are creating a significant step-change in this field [rsc](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQF9JZa-O8xpBXC13eEUAmMt3tBoUe8qR7KcKB57eW3yAxu4gu7BGyHDW6i6D69QAqEDv6OjEn3EBUfIV3zH90C64S24s680lvRhKUnXDCsF8kg5zDoiq4akXW_oRNLllWln04bA3txecgvGilFyDK3sk-Z5_5M2Y_ui). *   **Literature Review and Knowledge Synthesis:** LLMs are automating the search, analysis, and summarization of scientific literature, making literature reviews more efficient [scisummary](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHYMImorf0vexOfzMl5QWS4Ep0ZhbhU7z-H8wr8Qe_Oos1WSETT8h9aCOXs4qFZMNV0nkmfQIW6wWmlcrM2TLiTI8TNJmLschmAsRPwmOGWp6C3y2tpYc5afBxCIZad0) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHYMImorf0vexOfzMl5QWS4Ep0ZhbhU7z-H8wr8Qe_Oos1WSETT8h9aCOXs4qFZMNV0nkmfQIW6wWmlcrM2TLiTI8TNJmLschmAsRPwmOGWp6C3y2tpYc5afBxCIZad1) [ranchobiosciences](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHYMImorf0vexOfzMl5QWS4Ep0ZhbhU7z-H8wr8Qe_Oos1WSETT8h9aCOXs4qFZMNV0nkmfQIW6wWmlcrM2TLiTI8TNJmLschmAsRPwmOGWp6C3y2tpYc5afBxCIZad2). Platforms are emerging to help researchers extract data and identify consensus within research communities, though human oversight remains crucial for nuanced interpretation [scisummary](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHYMImorf0vexOfzMl5QWS4Ep0ZhbhU7z-H8wr8Qe_Oos1WSETT8h9aCOXs4qFZMNV0nkmfQIW6wWmlcrM2TLiTI8TNJmLschmAsRPwmOGWp6C3y2tpYc5afBxCIZad0).
*   **Hypothesis Generation and Validation:** AI, particularly LLMs, is revolutionizing hypothesis generation by processing vast datasets to identify complex patterns and synthesize information [weforum](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHnvFkgIS0kgAWnihZclcPr4pxgWw1tAw0NQFhMCI_cRIdSlijK7VujVFTmv29teftog6G_YSVXa5o255x3bN2FuYWyl9ndrAm8WiqjktRZlqSaCGxBEaGPAbt12Cc0QFDgPC5EQsWmbP3pG20lxyUfXjZ2BpLekxyaGVHHPAexQUh2q4AwgIpRz6EgTf_krQAIZ_MIrw5SNdJDqY9xLnBJwdHmqMJrcg==) [productscope](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFe1B09zFaiIUOFu5AHN1rmb1WIuNLA0qM_wKThUlRdix-W9N6901Vsv2ZVz8lMr9U8f6E21CoMBboEInUW-gZGtgTBKyLQeZP8DwRyxtbUI8l1vM8HPsafD0qFCmezuAOPPx1JNQAD5O8_V36vl-XrxK4=) [kiwiinnovate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH_r45gx8kdE8A-6d60A-hMsNcOAF7TmdoANmQq-tG2IaAvxrk6wX6ZxBbnWeRGOMtnVfR8XXqd8Zday3laB3S7qYSN21ejETAzsslGG0I3Qous3Y1_ofgA-DbBY4gwqrAZWHFm9A0mPQKHLnjiIL5t6icFy2cjFtaMe_gGch212rvSWukbwSL68NIrmjEq). Human-AI collaboration is a growing trend, leveraging the strengths of both to explore creative research avenues [mit](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGs-2QftfcJ2ANApCQoSSyiTJzbaVBE_v1gbTiAxUtAMlr7CyKYiYmnx8KgHVfRX2Jsy6bqbbJAUg3kuPQyHBsvv5yCc1JEXEmYDCZrCHcF81pEKBjja4n2VLLXJpoUE3sKMhPtBGBYXecrDgSMfwJgAibuHnmN48xw). AI is also being used for automated and predictive validation of hypotheses [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEmjS3EdWOxKvMEMQexXLZhGhPjExwVUy_YB_dG5SlwF-rNAJcyQ253h-jkIXd4S_rkxfkBNPmKgGgk0PrwBBFc0ZojuD8TIsLpkqjqui7hZRDBwWWCHygpET-rI2eg) [kiwiinnovate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH_r45gx8kdE8A-6d60A-hMsNcOAF7TmdoANmQq-tG2IaAvxrk6wX6ZxBbnWeRGOMtnVfR8XXqd8Zday3laB3S7qYSN21ejETAzsslGG0I3Qous3Y1_ofgA-DbBY4gwqrAZWHFm9A0mPQKHLnjiIL5t6icFy2cjFtaMe_gGch212rvSWukbwSL68NIrmjEq).
*   **Research Methodologies:** LLMs are fundamentally altering research methodologies by automating tasks, enhancing data analysis through machine learning integration, and facilitating interdisciplinary collaboration [insight7](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQElY-ZmqXD1hL6O1hu7Xn9AW4jMo5R1Y87Qj_U1LC8E7jndN9p2VJLtEdpNTcV0D98-slvfJCWwyYpK-sEvmxQD9fs8-1PITxzN61KcW_dOYtKWymW63aWKbbAOuPfYJPHPm9OuIr2KLvmCdUSphypJKLbqjRIbkHd09qKAmwaUXGEa) [ipinnovative](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGqzW_2_UfaTtzA2AcavbZmEjUZzDle7sgh_WG6jJwZTdO3r-COzmNKeGokKzo9TMI_I_qcV4YWX8VdDBBF5qEiI6Ja787EiPSju2Gk_fAuFWhWEw7u4aHqabM_6SJJZiT3GzNqH-Dzv3IMG7FY9pM33TtYJpW2Vfwm5NfBdqbs1duEuQ==) [artificialscience](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHuDWLXIhpTuwAdK-8o6RCEHSeL0fwk9Ii3a9mKFyaDREL4dPoeazaytQ2zOO02qNo8dxGPXJ0-HmOFMPZeTaw5QPTUoXCBPRFjUXjRFTyjF42g0-ycWOH-i_lZjq-vhTA_SWRGAo7B71ajA-bzypPVPGaHYuowbz8l7Q4jCvZWI47jcrObGMJCqhmy0h_cmDS8JPJnKQmi_1u02UoSeRoS-KXi7uz25S46F_b0FMc=). This leads to improved research quality and the emergence of new AI-powered research tools [ipinnovative](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGqzW_2_UfaTtzA2AcavbZmEjUZzDle7sgh_WG6jJwZTdO3r-COzmNKeGokKzo9TMI_I_qcV4YWX8VdDBBF5qEiI6Ja787EiPSju2Gk_fAuFWhWEw7u4aHqabM_6SJJZiT3GzNqH-Dzv3IMG7FY9pM33TtYJpW2Vfwm5NfBdqbs1duEuQ==).

**Technological Advancements and Training:**

*   **LLM Architectures:** Transformer-based models, Graph Neural Networks (GNNs), and multimodal models are key to current advancements in scientific applications [nih](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQE-uKBI-4-Ny3IR0vLn9_HAziku_vCg8vH4sjGftKIhCkk9bZ4mXmfv2s1u9QdPTAQ_cNHsAjiPY-t47N5MxL6o0di54PbG5HRLSb1PAiK61Jf4UjRWBPFeyGZM8ZoTH0xoLzm3) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGWjy306JTYsrOQsLaedGzuzujzhMM9xcqSgaBUNyZIxbB9kdKqOlr8PL1eQPLEG6XhUHyaKXIb_9rt8YjiWprYFRcJA-V2VK2M_lBzalYssmD8f5Dhr2Q652O86DifYMkCY8BWfnQQppCEDdg2pvoz2v6QI8n9xzXLcoCt_Lczjsr5dyBg6p2oD-OMpUOvHETtyq2VVu8hmUrXMrUTsTW5UNLAOSjcF1430ZIFV9WJDXIKo8S0rQ==) [consensus](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQG2u5Kg-z1p-mkjmVmK3sLJgsx9Z-rR0eeKtCncYb9EryW4rX43zrH_uLZKVObP2mJVk2011ZagpzAVpcxQp8qbdUN4dDrEnRB0BNgYEaVcFBMimq48SX14C-jwNXGezXFoQh8GXUwU8ASpR6jyYEiSlneJqwEORWwikpcRX1QJV9of4WdPb0nfN4Wma1C1_uUmRtCDzA99N-sKtdzupUppT2g=).
*   **Training Methodologies:** Pre-training followed by fine-tuning on domain-specific datasets is a standard approach, complemented by parameter-efficient fine-tuning (PEFT) and reinforcement learning techniques like RLHF [mdpi](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGWjy306JTYsrOQsLaedGzuzujzhMM9xcqSgaBUNyZIxbB9kdKqOlr8PL1eQPLEG6XhUHyaKXIb_9rt8YjiWprYFRcJA-V2VK2M_lBzalYssmD8f5Dhr2Q652O86DifYMkCY8BWfnQQppCEDdg2pvoz2v6QI8n9xzXLcoCt_Lczjsr5dyBg6p2oD-OMpUOvHETtyq2VVu8hmUrXMrUTsTW5UNLAOSjcF1430ZIFV9WJDXIKo8S0rQ==8) [nvidia](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH_lPnqlu26pc6z1G72MfITrRi2a3PuibbfTjLHtL7l_naKfAcedZ-8ea5xnFep4RibNl4mr_QzafS8MbPgQe3AJWLTkPgyzM8tb1VJalZVjfLs1gjYCgPp-qVTxKSCanciXqPyduf4XT1CoQ1GYyO9Uozc02EO3xMkpAXULQfrK1cvN5kOrENOKmiqxCmFlInk5C0goDOeJUDdLtfgh17OZLsULi6tejdJLr8ZTFXzeAxZPV-1KGc=) [researchgate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHH_51XOfuqBXg03tBickJVH-rS5TZILhEv61cZg0nGlHdmpuztUacWf7rF33-g4AmQouWiKmy61q8TbJY8_bMIUpxnqXdy-w4zToefZntkQIkceXDA9hcpZwpdxWYsF01toQB8SglGi8B4A8UXHwetqpcJRMyqrydwZZ-QZidocvECetan2zYxMyEJXYeb-eAoLEKNBKnsht5OUBJGXvNmChiFbq10rYTV5wg61). Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) is also crucial for grounding LLM outputs in relevant knowledge [rsc](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGWjy306JTYsrOQsLaedGzuzujzhMM9xcqSgaBUNyZIxbB9kdKqOlr8PL1eQPLEG6XhUHyaKXIb_9rt8YjiWprYFRcJA-V2VK2M_lBzalYssmD8f5Dhr2Q652O86DifYMkCY8BWfnQQppCEDdg2pvoz2v6QI8n9xzXLcoCt_Lczjsr5dyBg6p2oD-OMpUOvHETtyq2VVu8hmUrXMrUTsTW5UNLAOSjcF1430ZIFV9WJDXIKo8S0rQ==9).
*   **Emerging Trends:** Advancements in "reasoning models" that generate step-by-step analysis, multimodal capabilities, and the development of specialized LLMs and AI agents are shaping the future [wikipedia](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGuCE-uwZ66orwuLCkdlVB71MorEXZMhB5shcgV6sZtyvUX91RbQy1TB5B6dUyBHjn0ZTMDKpBuTDucD-iqVZXt--xoWPWH2e1dpsYoHqh0kd_1CAl3x8HLYrh0PIWxke8UnBxuaMU2ZSrOByPg) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFcG6LcQaufis0uIq0oA605mS8OFeYmVbDAR2krU2Vi15SK4mdv2GmxxD7_SrGUVZ8RcQpTE9PYM0I1CCHgBgTukDYbAiZWIJs2qO2LMpvcOr9zxEpf7KYyd651BMPmnIDH14OUIYS23hhLqj5uDhX5IdBW71aF1gtQCp7WvZiFP9Ps2HB_cYdFXRGiIMOdLaIhAIYPBQ==) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH93W2Cdzm-sD9QmlFH5FhP58VHUQUR4Y9bCMBWVaBzJAXSdtujB5nI2M1eppg7wP0KTDqLjQCjGezWT_FkTkeuWMi4Q5Kwji6-WKRYHbZRT3_7d8ycLYAQs14W).

**Challenges and Ethical Considerations:**

Despite the rapid progress, several challenges persist:

*   **Data Quality and Bias:** The need for high-quality, domain-specific datasets is paramount, as biases in training data can perpetuate unfair outcomes [eurekalert](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFu6Eg_E4H1fwsHB0ZL7Nwb29QgJ-sKCVUvhy27yUMDreHQ3n5q4RRdErSfByKsuy7igrkHbgKYP4yIbM0nSIaLzPqB1bQCjXkmqtGcL8SItGXGzyaEMEZ41b7WLNuUl5efvTACnDyyM2dEkQ==) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFJP07WbU4PmlmLEYuM28J1Ok_NWbkqMfhRrD7zCDYbC4UPliU416qAqgcIChe4iLKRJNVFvOaa-0POPukJtUux8xZCwSI5a7Fl4YCSJr20nVyvAhAWlMNk5FdDSReb_Pbx2siFiZwCRf2sf6Fa1HRNFtH71xAngQmUNdI7UOj6c1v8_RbBb1XCMszBpkjybSIRCTHbcERrsTQk-Uc=).
*   **Transparency and Accountability:** The "black-box" nature of LLMs necessitates a focus on transparency and accountability in their use [nih](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGqzW_2_UfaTtzA2AcavbZmEjUZzDle7sgh_WG6jJwZTdO3r-COzmNKeGokKzo9TMI_I_qcV4YWX8VdDBBF5qEiI6Ja787EiPSju2Gk_fAuFWhWEw7u4aHqabM_6SJJZiT3GzNqH-Dzv3IMG7FY9pM33TtYJpW2Vfwm5NfBdqbs1duEuQ==4).
*   **Misinformation and Hallucinations:** LLMs can generate plausible but incorrect information, requiring robust validation mechanisms [nih](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGqzW_2_UfaTtzA2AcavbZmEjUZzDle7sgh_WG6jJwZTdO3r-COzmNKeGokKzo9TMI_I_qcV4YWX8VdDBBF5qEiI6Ja787EiPSju2Gk_fAuFWhWEw7u4aHqabM_6SJJZiT3GzNqH-Dzv3IMG7FY9pM33TtYJpW2Vfwm5NfBdqbs1duEuQ==4) [lgresearch](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGqzW_2_UfaTtzA2AcavbZmEjUZzDle7sgh_WG6jJwZTdO3r-COzmNKeGokKzo9TMI_I_qcV4YWX8VdDBBF5qEiI6Ja787EiPSju2Gk_fAuFWhWEw7u4aHqabM_6SJJZiT3GzNqH-Dzv3IMG7FY9pM33TtYJpW2Vfwm5NfBdqbs1duEuQ==8).
*   **Ethical Implications:** Concerns surrounding privacy, data usage, and the ethical implications of AI-generated content are actively being discussed and addressed through frameworks like the EU AI Act [ieee](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGqzW_2_UfaTtzA2AcavbZmEjUZzDle7sgh_WG6jJwZTdO3r-COzmNKeGokKzo9TMI_I_qcV4YWX8VdDBBF5qEiI6Ja787EiPSju2Gk_fAuFWhWEw7u4aHqabM_6SJJZiT3GzNqH-Dzv3IMG7FY9pM33TtYJpW2Vfwm5NfBdqbs1duEuQ==3) [pqegroup](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFe1B09zFaiIUOFu5AHN1rmb1WIuNLA0qM_wKThUlRdix-W9N6901Vsv2ZVz8lMr9U8f6E21CoMBboEInUW-gZGtgTBKyLQeZP8DwRyxtbUI8l1vM8HPsafD0qFCmezuAOPPx1JNQAD5O8_V36vl-XrxK4=5).
*   **Evaluation:** Developing comprehensive benchmarks and metrics for evaluating LLMs in scientific contexts is an ongoing effort, with a shift towards assessing reasoning, factuality, and domain-specific performance [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFVmMPb7AJKBCimSGwjDvkgUPlfYS2KAw2JOEk0PMN57Rnd1_10t1SBhC-H-kNsSB0qPV2tM2z1HoMxhOpIg4g5BZQ1pTfVLK2aolYxWx67u6eXHk5Lq4KEGoM=) [research](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHb7moBy4c5bmKibudCk5fZdQKNOrXmGLCWw0v5D3SA6kiV-tjZs9Lz--TFcywdF-SPCK7RR_xcukRk-2kC2KfO_U44T4rSljmzoOfC3rqL5a-mzDUG203cn_ueM3wNp4KGZ8rpU-Z2CzF95R4IR0ffctsWvzUu86iCfj_zZpQzd5jAWlx3kvYLXcp7xJQuwTEJ).

The overarching trend is towards increasingly sophisticated LLMs integrated into the scientific workflow, promising accelerated discovery while simultaneously emphasizing the importance of responsible development, human oversight, and ethical deployment.

code.doc: Main LLM-facing entrypoint for the research agent. Wrapped with @eval so calls are traced/stored.
code.signature: (question: str, initial_queries: int = 3, max_loops: int = 2, reasoning_model: str = 'gemini-2.5-flash-lite') -> str
code.source:
@eval(name="research_agent")
def run_agent(question: str, initial_queries: int = 3, max_loops: int = 2, reasoning_model: str = "gemini-2.5-flash-lite") -> str:
    """
    Main LLM-facing entrypoint for the research agent. Wrapped with @eval so calls are traced/stored.
    """
    state = {
        "messages": [HumanMessage(content=question)],
        "initial_search_query_count": initial_queries,
        "max_research_loops": max_loops,
        "reasoning_model": reasoning_model,
    }
    result = graph.invoke(state)
    messages = result.get("messages", [])
    return messages[-1].content if messages else ""

kwargs.question: whats the current state of llm driven science discovery?

expected:
Large Language Models (LLMs) are profoundly transforming scientific discovery by significantly enhancing research efficiency, accelerating the pace of innovation, and enabling new avenues of knowledge exploration. These advanced AI models are adept at processing vast amounts of text-based data, leading to more efficient research processes and the facilitation of new insights across numerous scientific disciplines [ranchobiosciences](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFgnKSx-7NtD-gpmPu0CjNTcvi8mae7iSLd00WGHVpvJFPgrvsqRouCqYocjvvluwUaQGXkWzkw7qvPHgmrVHmj8RuzLGlTLavhwsmCgnw46TJFDMA1G42oKyqeovlnARTCH6fSMUUiZGrAIHsH-eEtMNsf4a_CH7BUzYwiSc9vl9r_M2aGLF8omMNvxXXY) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQELkD3qxp6sgLyztH58B6yRBlBuyHI5OSahlkm39NImK0AOJVPSMvbs5c1_pdDPQ4x0nz46mHypcUPzi5ClEnRcE27AgpALCxv90cTFfXLJNxsYZjS8YjORxmA=) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHwR99YEIhABuj3B0MqqbFcbQb6SYe96b810dtVmaSjjbVV6qq85vDeDGspOiMhnVzvHzb21ix2q4lK329JFgZ8cgDG722h8ULXjMcdwuNoIfFEqs9mng0yTtYgMyU=) [deeplp](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHFES5NEsB3J2TaLkV6cXSSGJ_pr0CitWreW5D8ZQ63AbWiamsjGAudCP7_uYk37AfpZZ_fiXNUTKUYvq2hRwYWu3k7-mmlhqcdrQ6XEomTuF3RvD9dyQ7fyFHgpREjBEI4raQoIdymAL-BvBHpkQAVEhj5e1mSWaqhjfbPrMMZSVlAu2E=).

Key applications and impacts of LLMs in scientific research include:

*   **Accelerated Research and Discovery:** LLMs significantly speed up research by enabling faster analysis of vast datasets, efficient literature reviews, and rapid hypothesis generation. They can process extensive scientific literature and diverse datasets, providing comprehensive overviews of existing knowledge and identifying research gaps [scholarly](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGG_Oh3ok0ENhxjJqkQlyMnaWlClKu18yZUBO_tEX7A7gmJaDzj3vAIaKPzCER40w2dpGh20WQXQzNGMZWeQEJBhlcDA5ahd3zt9qObYJJExqApHdgueGQqZtlITztZJBxkr8pPcq7nox915dBVKrLO_iJecwLWMYRtJV-3dYp-NDrgo_kW5OclJRaQgnXR2mHp) [ranchobiosciences](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQE-sWBiK-tnbf-StaEet7YBNRddV1YjbSq1KL1YzDn5y6sS6nIcAX-pj8TZDXLyVHFl9V8fxpWQmxnAMKC0BARX3rLWAmkV_rtf-hgtIhjzk4_wP1D7VMIyiSUubMqI6EWF6Qj679UYm_C-3L_vk9gDXzXP20KvpaFf6ON8CiVlcsRO_obaU80lJPlDizhZPg==) [enablemedicine](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFX_vdY0bmpX1gZs8cAKVUCueKF4kmi9Z5OqxjjN7EKFMUpyI7r75dtAmADsCvi2gzGmZA3iTofeyVb9O3D9n6sl6xZQHQTBTXVZYWgWoHIl0wly-xPXkINijJv1AbcSEydwXrxp8b5EYzP215UkVfG_w5sxd5GnOLI9_phUIKU084M-n4eYrGYZVLrIjY-7w==) [researchgate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHQu__GlD6w0QINOpvZX5bTBr1-B50qJ2wM2pdu6yhpxtWIm4LOOx3LuJ39KlaGneYnu6w4lKTHt-lXcBPpPb4KtcQWp2nD5AeW-4VFAD33cYp8XNKAhycaNjC2Uyxy0_wB5U6xf34ywBNzKyuXL77Ssrm8WszzKUQlSQYqto-iwNfHiAjXdnNMo8bCI3cojdY=).
*   **Enhanced Data Analysis and Insight Generation:** LLMs are proving valuable in analyzing complex datasets and generating insights, with some studies showing their ability to outperform human experts in specific tasks [manusai](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFxb3eahdNvN8GqIp9ckerGDeF3W3WxdGn4aBh-idcet9CGN0I4Cvx8Ud62lZA1FlYykt7rk2gHXxYAEjXku5yLOPRhU4QppmYEmhY-nIssan8tEOayjDv7sgTe3xawWBJoD8isNEPhqBr8R1lPaw==) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHwR99YEIhABuj3B0MqqbFcbQb6SYe96b810dtVmaSjjbVV6qq85vDeDGspOiMhnVzvHzb21ix2q4lK329JFgZ8cgDG722h8ULXjMcdwuNoIfFEqs9mng0yTtYgMyU=) [psychologytoday](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEK-L0RiEW--CqInORFAAKHV9J_NaMAYvbh4gYwUWvg3WSaoId1cfGh-KCVu2pIBdif5DXcQFMebZa4u2M1q2miyxy1RbbQ6FaCyL-QKb7_5ST_PedBswT9sr8eAypJTMX_kIzPVOeC4f7Kcoe1m42sv4BzZsMCUZK4fz1wE6Dx_FIqH_6nxk6YGMazTA54coaGNl3ekGHLyRaWgnRDyAsHby1yJtx3BejvFk7-kfPFplNYgw==). They automate labor-intensive tasks, freeing up scientists for higher-level analysis and interpretation [scholarly](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGG_Oh3ok0ENhxjJqkQlyMnaWlClKu18yZUBO_tEX7A7gmJaDzj3vAIaKPzCER40w2dpGh20WQXQzNGMZWeQEJBhlcDA5ahd3zt9qObYJJExqApHdgueGQqZtlITztZJBxkr8pPcq7nox915dBVKrLO_iJecwLWMYRtJV-3dYp-NDrgo_kW5OclJRaQgnXR2mHp) [ranchobiosciences](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQE-sWBiK-tnbf-StaEet7YBNRddV1YjbSq1KL1YzDn5y6sS6nIcAX-pj8TZDXLyVHFl9V8fxpWQmxnAMKC0BARX3rLWAmkV_rtf-hgtIhjzk4_wP1D7VMIyiSUubMqI6EWF6Qj679UYm_C-3L_vk9gDXzXP20KvpaFf6ON8CiVlcsRO_obaU80lJPlDizhZPg==).
*   **Hypothesis Generation and Idea Development:** LLMs can generate novel scientific ideas, directions, and hypotheses based on existing literature and knowledge [aclanthology](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFqaenENGfUwKkUvmPDBw969GmQT3jvZWzR-GmTIXPosfPHgKE6YqQgVcf2X0NCXZ1AnhSXmssCO4BvD6VrG8FXiX5oxRE4cR6e_631t6pD2jO2vzRbBADQ1pAzRZdXc1UfxjiQn_QdnKv-) [openreview](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFqukRo_CV-r3Gr6b9_K2L0Vd7361l1hxhn0FRCMBsg_Mw40l_VJC7sBVBsElgfF8E4QuV-VAUkpXPQqBuB-_p6yyckNdPlC3owzT97s7JW7Hea-1zv0sNPRaZHivDL51dvoyWB) [researchgate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFLeQzOYJIz75rCHGBms8pToWyA-icwZVOYeyb5b7fr5NGCjRO-tSBC9bO77qtKnlqDjxuCU1dchc2xcrM1995M_k03IA7hAJj_Dd4V-tiRmMU_LtvkasX4WORbd9D9bi7e0P6j9wVpBgZPTZFKOUScq6s1ElCD36yBAe1zCNwa6HfYlTP-VKXIIxj7lNjmBg==). LLM agents have demonstrated the ability to analyze large volumes of abstracts to produce structured, feasible, and novel hypotheses [4open](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQG6mahmDfaJWKeIHjrdLNQ7eTnbo9nH54aWMAqKhw7xvBRcVjl0tnPBe6_7_wNleKHdGSVJF85L7kz3HmDO20bZey8NVM6CqaaJ1QYWhEWqURdE8u8K5_pv6LOFNbIRW_fOoof6bvQAr--af_zvZEXdqJQ_z1wgvw==).
*   **Scientific Writing and Communication:** LLMs aid in summarizing research papers, drafting manuscripts, and improving writing style. They can also translate complex methods into accessible narratives for different audiences, fostering interdisciplinary collaboration [researchgate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFLeQzOYJIz75rCHGBms8pToWyA-icwZVOYeyb5b7fr5NGCjRO-tSBC9bO77qtKnlqDjxuCU1dchc2xcrM1995M_k03IA7hAJj_Dd4V-tiRmMU_LtvkasX4WORbd9D9bi7e0P6j9wVpBgZPTZFKOUScq6s1ElCD36yBAe1zCNwa6HfYlTP-VKXIIxj7lNjmBg==) [ranchobiosciences](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHWkRCP-XLI-Pmm91aMs0Pr8Y79ekIqdbRD0fTloxIvDS2Hv1hD9RjmUROonLQ5wkhfu8Q5nNRv9nwFMZXLjh5vaIoFXVKmwpv_TnfHKB0zS0wXbdNSKdQwE7NVw2h6fJh4cGRy6TgpxSoGMmQE0U1OW5OhXLJkXg5P_QM2z0I55nLqrc4rlpk99NPifoTrWg==) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGR08jlfRuT_hBu0yqH4dANtCGTIq-gYnjOh1DHGd4RObPaLE39eeluAQuI9Myn5rsHns_VnQlT_KlTEIjvvzlewx2mnN2qQwR1EBRbiQzXIpFOai-B2iCAUlDe).
*   **Domain-Specific Applications:** LLMs are being tailored for specific scientific fields, such as drug discovery, materials science, and genomics.
    *   In **drug discovery**, LLMs revolutionize the pipeline by identifying target-disease linkages, designing drug molecules, and predicting efficacy and safety [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEEJu9V7lqCBJ5seZ6UIxbMCiEeHRV5wikBOkNZWblCLeGGOLXDzvsYvibO_c6FyoQJLyIE_MIOegeuTktx2mrWmyM5FzQ4fPV5ugy4G0YdCZBNDB6NbXaqoKaY) [nih](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQG2mXZfmEWnOitbAtmu9JgoXAvaV_kTiqxvZBCaHWTIFGTwOw9CQiRNT2Njc7GVQuw_-8X5KxEpg9AP5A97_npT2-pyD-gVfXIijINcqE_ZbKytM5QlumvkRiKD-d6d5IDbet6-8cDPBWDomJ6q) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQF0Iwnm_GKXBprONz5VoEUE1Gf97aV8CUrHbqRudNMccyRRSYUC1fkyFCCYgTKADtqA-_CrJZnNTygY-mrmRAwg9JqmyXlFGxPWcTh7pddVvuqu94YdWcgQhArKyQNX). Specialized LLMs can assist in retrosynthetic planning and predicting reaction outcomes [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQF0Iwnm_GKXBprONz5VoEUE1Gf97aV8CUrHbqRudNMccyRRSYUC1fkyFCCYgTKADtqA-_CrJZnNTygY-mrmRAwg9JqmyXlFGxPWcTh7pddVvuqu94YdWcgQhArKyQNX).
    *   In **materials science**, LLMs analyze information to uncover hidden knowledge and enable breakthroughs in material properties, predict synthesis pathways, and improve chemical synthesis planning [intellegens](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGX8_p81L8zyztYYHDQ3XtKNhOu3SXeMKCBzuhKjGbLmj_x5TPYUIHgoK4iOum64rd6-mAyAnmh0S45IZ7s9aCDYIM3sZ5j_d05hHUbc_L6X0WtTZNJJF3MA-BPvYvKD2mzObfHTQKU80BkV0xYm17cY7PYv7MXNfn4hgIprInDh1sJ6_ovEcBRXDGpYHY3fgQMORLnD_YBLDA=) [rsc](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHWkRCP-XLI-Pmm91aMs0Pr8Y79ekIqdbRD0fTloxIvDS2Hv1hD9RjmUROonLQ5wkhfu8Q5nNRv9nwFMZXLjh5vaIoFXVKmwpv_TnfHKB0zS0wXbdNSKdQwE7NVw2h6fJh4cGRy6TgpxSoGMmQE0U1OW5OhXLJkXg5P_QM2z0I55nLqrc4rlpk99NPifoTrWg==0) [researchgate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHWkRCP-XLI-Pmm91aMs0Pr8Y79ekIqdbRD0fTloxIvDS2Hv1hD9RjmUROonLQ5wkhfu8Q5nNRv9nwFMZXLjh5vaIoFXVKmwpv_TnfHKB0zS0wXbdNSKdQwE7NVw2h6fJh4cGRy6TgpxSoGMmQE0U1OW5OhXLJkXg5P_QM2z0I55nLqrc4rlpk99NPifoTrWg==1) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHWkRCP-XLI-Pmm91aMs0Pr8Y79ekIqdbRD0fTloxIvDS2Hv1hD9RjmUROonLQ5wkhfu8Q5nNRv9nwFMZXLjh5vaIoFXVKmwpv_TnfHKB0zS0wXbdNSKdQwE7NVw2h6fJh4cGRy6TgpxSoGMmQE0U1OW5OhXLJkXg5P_QM2z0I55nLqrc4rlpk99NPifoTrWg==2).
    *   In **genomics research**, LLMs automate functional genomics, analyze gene sets, and identify common functions, significantly reducing manual labor [synbiobeta](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHWkRCP-XLI-Pmm91aMs0Pr8Y79ekIqdbRD0fTloxIvDS2Hv1hD9RjmUROonLQ5wkhfu8Q5nNRv9nwFMZXLjh5vaIoFXVKmwpv_TnfHKB0zS0wXbdNSKdQwE7NVw2h6fJh4cGRy6TgpxSoGMmQE0U1OW5OhXLJkXg5P_QM2z0I55nLqrc4rlpk99NPifoTrWg==3) [ucsd](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHWkRCP-XLI-Pmm91aMs0Pr8Y79ekIqdbRD0fTloxIvDS2Hv1hD9RjmUROonLQ5wkhfu8Q5nNRv9nwFMZXLjh5vaIoFXVKmwpv_TnfHKB0zS0wXbdNSKdQwE7NVw2h6fJh4cGRy6TgpxSoGMmQE0U1OW5OhXLJkXg5P_QM2z0I55nLqrc4rlpk99NPifoTrWg==4).
*   **AI Agents for Research:** The development of LLM-powered AI agents is enabling more complex applications and autonomous research capabilities. These agents can act as data scientists, process massive datasets, and even lead aspects of the innovation process [manusai](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFxb3eahdNvN8GqIp9ckerGDeF3W3WxdGn4aBh-idcet9CGN0I4Cvx8Ud62lZA1FlYykt7rk2gHXxYAEjXku5yLOPRhU4QppmYEmhY-nIssan8tEOayjDv7sgTe3xawWBJoD8isNEPhqBr8R1lPaw==) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHwR99YEIhABuj3B0MqqbFcbQb6SYe96b810dtVmaSjjbVV6qq85vDeDGspOiMhnVzvHzb21ix2q4lK329JFgZ8cgDG722h8ULXjMcdwuNoIfFEqs9mng0yTtYgMyU=) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQF3yQRSUlcmMKGRNVyt-i9NsCoQwhuEwcZsoDx6GlCqr14tOmVp4dRcIvHRrr5unA1qYg6JK5gxRjDcu_CPf9_PKYgHqVWLiPHqmcFAiRDkE1UKUKNetX4bgQMszCOYnCwDXMy1fJ8abi4TY2ODaKQt0k-YZKAy4pe26Mo516VMcULoq4EmUPXD6t5vOdfaSO85_6tsEoRCpDmYQHAKWU_3Cezaiy9FLghqCPos2VsD2NDSYvfpwP9YJNqLToKuZWby) [researchgate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFLeQzOYJIz75rCHGBms8pToWyA-icwZVOYeyb5b7fr5NGCjRO-tSBC9bO77qtKnlqDjxuCU1dchc2xcrM1995M_k03IA7hAJj_Dd4V-tiRmMU_LtvkasX4WORbd9D9bi7e0P6j9wVpBgZPTZFKOUScq6s1ElCD36yBAe1zCNwa6HfYlTP-VKXIIxj7lNjmBg==) [rdworldonline](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGO3fIlEuEq7sd8-T-yIJQhzkmINyDhOxx4AeDjMhwCynueWjbOA4K516FRvcILNJML9URgMYzpE6BEVlBBtigwHXLHpPNq3veR-3GmMlcfmpG3KyuV504tgKE_oMV2AjFzxRiTK__4z8UoZ7n4LF6wzBWQq5Szu6S2E4-ey_MBAazTOIbGe8jr).
*   **Quantifiable Benefits:** LLMs offer significant time savings in literature review, hypothesis generation, and experimental design. They also contribute to cost reduction by leveraging pre-trained models and employing optimization techniques like model distillation [researchgate](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHQu__GlD6w0QINOpvZX5bTBr1-B50qJ2wM2pdu6yhpxtWIm4LOOx3LuJ39KlaGneYnu6w4lKTHt-lXcBPpPb4KtcQWp2nD5AeW-4VFAD33cYp8XNKAhycaNjC2Uyxy0_wB5U6xf34ywBNzKyuXL77Ssrm8WszzKUQlSQYqto-iwNfHiAjXdnNMo8bCI3cojdY=) [4open](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQG6mahmDfaJWKeIHjrdLNQ7eTnbo9nH54aWMAqKhw7xvBRcVjl0tnPBe6_7_wNleKHdGSVJF85L7kz3HmDO20bZey8NVM6CqaaJ1QYWhEWqURdE8u8K5_pv6LOFNbIRW_fOoof6bvQAr--af_zvZEXdqJQ_z1wgvw==) [ai-weekly](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFSSfxqRAg-Pa8HNEOuLayLykDsUq1qXD1ql7KXIZ92MYNdH5CCrxS03SvCGvGuTiwk5WFjBscRdAaxtFhGdGs75wOdtLQ4G23veMUHcKyVhh2O-FTcH6Uw_LkN8uBdRlnZpsqibv9cu4YQb-xihtyFBMNd93Z4-UwcOaRnL352Xg==).

While LLMs offer immense potential, challenges remain, including the need for vast, high-quality data, the occurrence of "hallucinations" (generating confident but false information), significant computational costs, and the inherent complexity of scientific domains [nih](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGKJ5_gEC7lpZ7m2CfxhoWOPtaUkHBlaoWjn7q798Lhxov0JARCT8d10h077ZFLHs_ZtFll1FuXMx6GxZV13bBHm39rDgJlujcRBZAoYElX-XtmMP_qmWD6slFpscwr-R1Hl6SMTgGfMpM3Ilio) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFkwnOEL3ebo_RuTgDq3yyyoUGLtu6qK9Ccn7lE1uVOTpEXXPw_FKFIAwg1ZZfT_JSxO7qIxC8o6z7yE7p6cjciZuwBrlxBvfX5L4sIweAd5-ORKmmxxcpnOFJqV061) [sciencedaily](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGSofs5abYSLYdFcZ3nR6RonEEfwbgrVhNnHrTkc7-ZYDGL_6yQKtsLTEv0SRwoXr8_JtsnEgtOjOP2_pDWBRnOdgEIsLZl_UKdTAWxLjqHJiRKlL2K5hY-sZvfmDY2CH14A5-Hn9nWBsC4R2kLtMURqRBXqGGyxNn8). Interpretability and the ethical implications of AI in research are also critical areas of focus [bmj](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQE8RnLnbpVuy4_Em4mwUEUxN1TXEvIe4GlT6D3Tyjl3j1QUVSL-QKWgN6wzD9pF45RxytuX85NmXQv3rVDKucUD8Y1ThbRDYiHKLAr5hFXyLh3NcQ6EjT21uxG0UeozKsx4LGUBqjiagB5hj2smualEWAZ_bh0sDqat3r7KAa-PQz1vcA==) [mdpi](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHQnhq9vv5KI2b0K5kRngacmRG3gKm3KmwikgUTZnrwAvdNVPp2LbVfohoI4sumYhiRIWXFlVs1fEchn5B0HBrWbkEYr7eqB607SwVV1D-hLRKTuXS0wA6v-ywVKQWAdDmkm5vA). LLMs are currently viewed as valuable collaborators and tools that enhance research efficiency and quality, rather than being solely capable of independent scientific discovery without human intervention [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQELkD3qxp6sgLyztH58B6yRBlBuyHI5OSahlkm39NImK0AOJVPSMvbs5c1_pdDPQ4x0nz46mHypcUPzi5ClEnRcE27AgpALCxv90cTFfXLJNxsYZjS8YjORxmA=1) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGHOVZen9_9YechRlAB0eo9VK44df9FwhmYHL3tC9yeWSX6G_cKXFa9h_blbzieqTMJgvx0ZPiDPlgGuAkT-xgdYBEW5mE9bsyFC5-Ur8X32wrU_zku4ePbTTIa3SlV8pHH10KrSoGDldYe7t2e_NGUEQHyABgSg9N-gkR8dXlP9dvAQgqVxt-ZRzCTMWshgErmULgKgrZmSxA=). The ongoing evolution of LLMs promises further advancements, potentially unlocking new frontiers of scientific understanding [ranchobiosciences](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFgnKSx-7NtD-gpmPu0CjNTcvi8mae7iSLd00WGHVpvJFPgrvsqRouCqYocjvvluwUaQGXkWzkw7qvPHgmrVHmj8RuzLGlTLavhwsmCgnw46TJFDMA1G42oKyqeovlnARTCH6fSMUUiZGrAIHsH-eEtMNsf4a_CH7BUzYwiSc9vl9r_M2aGLF8omMNvxXXY).

code.doc: Main LLM-facing entrypoint for the research agent. Wrapped with @eval so calls are traced/stored.
code.signature: (question: str, initial_queries: int = 3, max_loops: int = 2, reasoning_model: str = 'gemini-2.5-flash-lite') -> str
code.source:
@eval(name="research_agent")
def run_agent(question: str, initial_queries: int = 3, max_loops: int = 2, reasoning_model: str = "gemini-2.5-flash-lite") -> str:
    """
    Main LLM-facing entrypoint for the research agent. Wrapped with @eval so calls are traced/stored.
    """
    state = {
        "messages": [HumanMessage(content=question)],
        "initial_search_query_count": initial_queries,
        "max_research_loops": max_loops,
        "reasoning_model": reasoning_model,
    }
    result = graph.invoke(state)
    messages = result.get("messages", [])
    return messages[-1].content if messages else ""

code.doc: Main LLM-facing entrypoint for the research agent. Wrapped with @eval so calls are traced/stored.
code.signature: (question: str, initial_queries: int = 3, max_loops: int = 2, reasoning_model: str = 'gemini-2.5-flash-lite') -> str
code.source:
@eval(name="research_agent")
def run_agent(question: str, initial_queries: int = 3, max_loops: int = 2, reasoning_model: str = "gemini-2.5-flash-lite") -> str:
    """
    Main LLM-facing entrypoint for the research agent. Wrapped with @eval so calls are traced/stored.
    """
    state = {
        "messages": [HumanMessage(content=question)],
        "initial_search_query_count": initial_queries,
        "max_research_loops": max_loops,
        "reasoning_model": reasoning_model,
    }
    result = graph.invoke(state)
    messages = result.get("messages", [])
    return messages[-1].content if messages else ""

code.doc: Main LLM-facing entrypoint for the research agent. Wrapped with @eval so calls are traced/stored.
code.signature: (question: str, initial_queries: int = 3, max_loops: int = 2, reasoning_model: str = 'gemini-2.5-flash-lite') -> str
code.source:
@eval(name="research_agent")
def run_agent(question: str, initial_queries: int = 3, max_loops: int = 2, reasoning_model: str = "gemini-2.5-flash-lite") -> str:
    """
    Main LLM-facing entrypoint for the research agent. Wrapped with @eval so calls are traced/stored.
    """
    state = {
        "messages": [HumanMessage(content=question)],
        "initial_search_query_count": initial_queries,
        "max_research_loops": max_loops,
        "reasoning_model": reasoning_model,
    }
    result = graph.invoke(state)
    messages = result.get("messages", [])
    return messages[-1].content if messages else ""

code.doc: Main LLM-facing entrypoint for the research agent. Wrapped with @eval so calls are traced/stored.
code.signature: (question: str, initial_queries: int = 3, max_loops: int = 2, reasoning_model: str = 'gemini-2.5-flash-lite') -> str
code.source:
@eval(name="research_agent")
def run_agent(question: str, initial_queries: int = 3, max_loops: int = 2, reasoning_model: str = "gemini-2.5-flash-lite") -> str:
    """
    Main LLM-facing entrypoint for the research agent. Wrapped with @eval so calls are traced/stored.
    """
    state = {
        "messages": [HumanMessage(content=question)],
        "initial_search_query_count": initial_queries,
        "max_research_loops": max_loops,
        "reasoning_model": reasoning_model,
    }
    result = graph.invoke(state)
    messages = result.get("messages", [])
    return messages[-1].content if messages else ""

These agents integrate core LLM capabilities with enhanced reasoning, planning, tool usage, and memory to tackle sophisticated workflows across various industries [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQF5Y_08yoncARur2x_FCV_86Lxwg_yuHf9PSo5r-HLCvzB345hgIF6s5wXAuW7i6nLLAjlayvj1R0k6-UGtTKcR_Zbm4GRIyer2wKWRFxk_V-BPd_RfyyWAJILYaA3lwZRz6qFy5lJ65Qz8ixve0R17JnO2HTxJsnHKvnb0MbKtWW5Vvwrjgd0sXKlXqtd6UOJKm1hihE7aEJd0MR_MzZhxn8-MV2GimKgi-XqsiDnOvsrfDcLtPwszjSUHuoewqYzmRJIh52t74pPlQwlIBfeLGA==) [cognitivetoday](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHwdzrOjqWnvJaU221t4XRntpliEg9spvWvghJdWvIEhLXxSLWg6iHc80r7spD8mP0SFuvzeNGBAQHgOZ3kfGvPS4aiTmQKd1NN7OkrqneFYlyPByQ6pExphK67JKocOONA0-QTV708sBDgf559pVCPXBYeifpRwhJUqSyeLhxwNDb5IPgt) [manusai](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGY_AixlZMWxk2pUCqp5h11TfV-G7oIvlySurFXwJtftB5N4Eg-oYLTyVNy1O5CISJ0lA6KBbD8nHxLGlT5dZNxchgb4AGt0ZpEty1wH6k4LtxlkyLHQJRDpDSc426uaGmTjUyYHSwC_Z3c0zqq7pA=).

Key developments and trends include:

**Enhanced Capabilities and Architectures:**
*   **Reasoning and Planning:** While LLMs inherently have limitations in planning and reasoning, significant efforts are underway to overcome these. This involves integrating external symbolic solvers, utilizing graph learning to improve planning, and developing more sophisticated architectures [manusai](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH8xIykAaoK-so-v_GldSFJ6cByoQdU3d-fgiUXA89e2pIOOWNCCsXck3lhDcz8bwVGJ9hhZvUTmbNzVXz71Kg97pLhomPV8NK4yhZa92Wb7Rkd4XGnw7CCUObVqEwrSzT8qxeRYoPaKMQ8brzkDQM=) [juteq](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFPAoe4lsB4VALwMkOZnIQhtT2UjlmvZ4CEldTgMVpHwQ0toFKyjhOco8IYj-xYEQWFoI--fuojq7V2Pq8BJgyi66ykMjYu4X5Zgtpcmyx_Wym3ElNzJdBSG96AUh8bMsVqKIMWY3Gb-84QKVHGmv7C0g==) [cognitivetoday](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHwdzrOjqWnvJaU221t4XRntpliEg9spvWvghJdWvIEhLXxSLWg6iHc80r7spD8mP0SFuvzeNGBAQHgOZ3kfGvPS4aiTmQKd1NN7OkrqneFYlyPByQ6pExphK67JKocOONA0-QTV708sBDgf559pVCPXBYeifpRwhJUqSyeLhxwNDb5IPgt). Frameworks like SymAgent and Logic-LM are enabling LLMs to decompose complex goals into manageable sub-tasks and leverage structured logic [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQER9Qbd-qCaPixTyrSc2ooFYiS-Jt-7OTBWap4NT0osr1ILUlo1VHsjcFjjKg9n7t0LcIqEY1rx4HTygPoJa4s_WiHTZYBad3OezSIhgc6jqODb7GUaqv5NRnVMDr1o) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFbOc7Y45kDCa_O0FwSo9KET1125FemiPXr4LsbkKZ01WiyhYh1HNrdtfilVe7EOw8EfobV5o_OsT-p3809Ber_aecfCdV2Mqh5OULFnofYOVE98IhoUKv7VFLZ).
*   **Multimodality:** LLMs are increasingly adept at processing and generating content across various modalities, including text, images, and audio in real-time [turing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFiZ8l6ctGWmR4unHiFTiPexhk2iRjc9ioHmI_5utlIft4dV8UUGJrzLn_CGtrnXofoP8IosX60gnJ6I2_KY9W7_npCdWFZDD7K-u8ODctlDP-GQnO3TxjQpuslwnQs-va2k9yRc-DaQAJO) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEZMHSIW4JDOR86DunV2DaQPG2FTxmvpO9kOouUiuKJPNs0EORS5qTSVQG5Q2rRuLuZfPQf30gpqZkqBrEd0mDfduPV3MKGRzTXt8LANn5_DIyTFwl3zYCQyPmCcqjDO1K8LsdL6ziJQW33khm5V-EaVCHxJHGfkBEG3awF6SRVrigD2CviUDMrXFfLL1xd4ssr12COjb_uPvn3bzE9RaxIauM3Fn1l4OXeqPyq3UOEcfN41Kz5pioY).
*   **Agentic Workflows and Multi-Agent Systems:** A growing focus is on "agentic workflows" where LLMs collaborate to complete tasks. Multi-agent systems, where work is orchestrated among networks of autonomous agents, are demonstrating superior performance in complex environments [juteq](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFPAoe4lsB4VALwMkOZnIQhtT2UjlmvZ4CEldTgMVpHwQ0toFKyjhOco8IYj-xYEQWFoI--fuojq7V2Pq8BJgyi66ykMjYu4X5Zgtpcmyx_Wym3ElNzJdBSG96AUh8bMsVqKIMWY3Gb-84QKVHGmv7C0g==) [amitysolutions](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFpVvdvoqBPlbQLXLhoXRhouQ51S1o5yPgrJo0-oXgJuYieIMhRN4ZTa_viqkke7hQInq_DTJs4spjW3tpYffzid_DR6zt9c_lXdhJ6VnSt5EyiWIjg8AhA9wNtrBVwOkOwdZS1gThkWJoLmLKLzzHLwxoUMZVzyQ==) [deloitte](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEqEh5QVz1y_CP6NRGtkpS2C4hTBalDK9H69nbxrmD0HABppzKZ60Oeh4baAwolx67LT654uE2Drdzo3ky8sEHkIO3BCGKQ6xCQM6iV8Eeqf0aJrpyi59ImealjN5SexhBpyjOpiWSrZY8n0NexEAPKdxuryhK-xk_I_3xAwvC4ojbd3rMEn0cmwjlwvunWGE07_jx7UO9SSWpselByNY-dU6s9Ijev0uU7q0KLBscvvf7GzIUJtIvNEMwjZKliFHEOjN8GU-Q4J5ovmcgN-EPGl5oGHWD2JHlqgrm577CvgpwT). Frameworks like LangGraph are emerging to support these structured agents [towardsdatascience](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFkwhL0FoduN5OTosP6KCh_n8jTBTDoX-0WWt9dS24wp-4emuQoOa6TC0yT9aSQ7VaI0JszFaOaOz7xA28ngOncehxaDrFggkFrbdKX_oTmQO3J_j4bsUZj986ZFrSoyHG4Ku9B5a2akM2LAm670LJjwPXqAMST0MmBoisjS784lC-hBYgnTJK-Y8XzUk3b7LTy7tRB_DrTQSM95-Z0Y7vQ).
*   **Tool Use and Function Calling:** Agents are being equipped with the ability to use external tools and APIs to compensate for LLM weaknesses in areas like mathematics and real-time data access [thenewstack](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHXbSKZimd2hS3NBTzq2TWo5RFBcjI9SHUDO7YKOeE02DOQpZYJqMhKo8bxVSUu1EvUMhMzQXBc9DOSx6SJ089-raoYNi_PIvLPcqn5_PRDRJigIiSruTBqTZUQBFoTLADIm4WyrsIdT1rFghNmrWc9tuMycxaaBUYaGtpAgPW3balBwS7oUh7X2DEvjYAfTg==) [ibm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGnn8AobyM9X3Mn2RBrGSiWhMSjYL6ne1g-ey7IcJBXzCTCXOR-fqG9XsRCNRe0txSf0xrEDeEepdZ4_QH6F_vv3BP-iaE3RaXRTnioPifTOzN3biz7BPLwygewHQ9zp7HaBK79soUtTCvNnAm5QC4=). Function calling is a key mechanism for this integration [opendatascience](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHE9kU8kGEPMQbZN4tLAQtj3wNme2tq4hPm4Wz0P2qskrx4zjfVBuCeK7-zkFeqj9tCCwinSN8dmnrZ1ka1z4AnxfD6LwOIoYpjo9_05fgTbKZVSonf-CwyHvop0Xu6oMYB0bPWMY2hrATI2c3bbD9rW3IfVW_dKq5WLUKMxgtna2SvXvR0f-CR). However, challenges remain in tool selection, orchestration, and ensuring reliability and accuracy in tool execution [apxml](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEqVeCRMbTDcTfKKK8TyrsW9PRXjHG1uHkfZ6674CBxaM1OvLKYObvzG10l_mOp38n8xqy3WRod5p9Bf9Aq34xeqR6hg3y5pKh5dC0DSCaUhO3lG1mlXT__YW4YbhaqLd3BsdeeSUDjXzpSLGSCtserXWl69iNXRCD8sNlvH1FKNEdlgi3AbSuZaN8hZzf26TYas_4WFwDuqkiNfjW4xUUD) [learningdaily](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH-g8v67RgXZEUst_KS5TYguZfHQso11RUHiZtfGldKzesEGHVzAsjVebwKXksgt_0aQIy73QwsPHAyeBNYxZNkhh35sSPx2WHwF-YBIsegaWSDZD2wrbX3z5l3gV8KYTsRnfliDeaw8ybsPahkYH22vd9RkrG5KpdlwFu7cfrKPH9zdij4U2KsOh5LnI-Exm7ytCRptY1UTamYEGpY2A==).
*   **Memory and Context:** Advancements are being made to augment LLMs' context retention capabilities, enabling more coherent interactions. However, managing complex and layered context information remains an ongoing challenge [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEgmD-YLyGrqj59kQmTDnZfhjdBx6wdtNiZbBD8_z7IOY8AzIZoYe-5JZRsNA_fRSVLV7a88QVXKZu4c8h4KVTc-hzRnNjOM0CYfXKcm65h-WWYCVtjj7vtT-bkynEitvEqRlQF_PJmd6AfkbrY3Xf3J7asm3uXhNN8bR_9JDJ3itQ29EjQXEMiYpznQXsTsXyayDbYBFsVO4SxO-2plBhCBTAQn-U=) [thenewstack](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHXbSKZimd2hS3NBTzq2TWo5RFBcjI9SHUDO7YKOeE02DOQpZYJqMhKo8bxVSUu1EvUMhMzQXBc9DOSx6SJ089-raoYNi_PIvLPcqn5_PRDRJigIiSruTBqTZUQBFoTLADIm4WyrsIdT1rFghNmrWc9tuMycxaaBUYaGtpAgPW3balBwS7oUh7X2DEvjYAfTg==) [arxiv](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGSybViP5toZNiO-uPbEUcUspWo1wmvHTooTDVFN9BgYgz6nVv30NUgxWk9fBfybPLKGdCi8ctLGUIemVUOYtgx9We0t-W5auVsdhVuFAtWXpRAd9_KJoJgw-bY).

**Focus on Implementation and Practical Applications:**
*   **From Experimentation to Production:** The field is rapidly transitioning from theoretical exploration to the practical building and deployment of LLM-powered applications, driving tangible business value [opendatascience](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHE9kU8kGEPMQbZN4tLAQtj3wNme2tq4hPm4Wz0P2qskrx4zjfVBuCeK7-zkFeqj9tCCwinSN8dmnrZ1ka1z4AnxfD6LwOIoYpjo9_05fgTbKZVSonf-CwyHvop0Xu6oMYB0bPWMY2hrATI2c3bbD9rW3IfVW_dKq5WLUKMxgtna2SvXvR0f-CR) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQF5Y_08yoncARur2x_FCV_86Lxwg_yuHf9PSo5r-HLCvzB345hgIF6s5wXAuW7i6nLLAjlayvj1R0k6-UGtTKcR_Zbm4GRIyer2wKWRFxk_V-BPd_RfyyWAJILYaA3lwZRz6qFy5lJ65Qz8ixve0R17JnO2HTxJsnHKvnb0MbKtWW5Vvwrjgd0sXKlXqtd6UOJKm1hihE7aEJd0MR_MzZhxn8-MV2GimKgi-XqsiDnOvsrfDcLtPwszjSUHuoewqYzmRJIh52t74pPlQwlIBfeLGA==).
*   **Specialized Agents:** There's a trend towards developing LLMs and agents tailored for specific industries and tasks, such as data scientists or content generators [manusai](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH8xIykAaoK-so-v_GldSFJ6cByoQdU3d-fgiUXA89e2pIOOWNCCsXck3lhDcz8bwVGJ9hhZvUTmbNzVXz71Kg97pLhomPV8NK4yhZa92Wb7Rkd4XGnw7CCUObVqEwrSzT8qxeRYoPaKMQ8brzkDQM=) [turing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFiZ8l6ctGWmR4unHiFTiPexhk2iRjc9ioHmI_5utlIft4dV8UUGJrzLn_CGtrnXofoP8IosX60gnJ6I2_KY9W7_npCdWFZDD7K-u8ODctlDP-GQnO3TxjQpuslwnQs-va2k9yRc-DaQAJO).
*   **Automation:** LLM agents are transforming workflow automation, marketing, and customer support through personalized campaigns, efficient data analysis, and 24/7 assistance [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFPAoe4lsB4VALwMkOZnIQhtT2UjlmvZ4CEldTgMVpHwQ0toFKyjhOco8IYj-xYEQWFoI--fuojq7V2Pq8BJgyi66ykMjYu4X5Zgtpcmyx_Wym3ElNzJdBSG96AUh8bMsVqKIMWY3Gb-84QKVHGmv7C0g==0).
*   **Domain-Specific Applications:** Autonomous LLM agents are finding applications in supply chain management, finance (optimizing trading and risk management), software development (e.g., "Devin"), data science, and healthcare [taylorandfrancis](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHc_GApAXaQrUu2jdGVbj2fKWoIejaWoVHIZpd2UVw6KBDrqDjYdSHEUgzCxOx37SeNi7NleArRGRsfvxzll7csUwcLfHKdXKWNU81kn6hzoFocLuF39c0_39nOersfJcnqrx6KNCvaD8UI1BPA9wXuL1kCea9y2CN4oZLTkDoONKpk) [ufl](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEUHRzlWbJdgWhB2wgl491dQB9C0fHIPMXsh4YsHHrESoRSrZKQeJQGowolbQCtrIbo0IHeYX7GY2c1kXRC4SwYZK8PVZC-oN8rRsX-Rpk4jXdJhw5c06uSRuD-4xnLXeQjtIL4bU-btzZUOjHfTdo=0) [deloitte](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEqEh5QVz1y_CP6NRGtkpS2C4hTBalDK9H69nbxrmD0HABppzKZ60Oeh4baAwolx67LT654uE2Drdzo3ky8sEHkIO3BCGKQ6xCQM6iV8Eeqf0aJrpyi59ImealjN5SexhBpyjOpiWSrZY8n0NexEAPKdxuryhK-xk_I_3xAwvC4ojbd3rMEn0cmwjlwvunWGE07_jx7UO9SSWpselByNY-dU6s9Ijev0uU7q0KLBscvvf7GzIUJtIvNEMwjZKliFHEOjN8GU-Q4J5ovmcgN-EPGl5oGHWD2JHlqgrm577CvgpwT) [manusai](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGY_AixlZMWxk2pUCqp5h11TfV-G7oIvlySurFXwJtftB5N4Eg-oYLTyVNy1O5CISJ0lA6KBbD8nHxLGlT5dZNxchgb4AGt0ZpEty1wH6k4LtxlkyLHQJRDpDSc426uaGmTjUyYHSwC_Z3c0zqq7pA=) [theblue](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEOLxJ9aIxpKlM6XxkJ9_dhXhVlGyFTiVNjBPnSCRFAzITnNz8i9Ed2onPCoFlSj4ZMrIw58alu-YS9LqsS5OFtqtd1VnPjpI_FUGsDRtgGCnLtGklAdat-6VAisdYzKSSYXqwGpxG_cmA7nIyAAw==).

**Challenges and Limitations:**
*   **Reliability and Accuracy:** Despite progress, LLMs can still struggle with precise calculations, logical reasoning, and may generate inaccurate information or "hallucinate" [manusai](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH8xIykAaoK-so-v_GldSFJ6cByoQdU3d-fgiUXA89e2pIOOWNCCsXck3lhDcz8bwVGJ9hhZvUTmbNzVXz71Kg97pLhomPV8NK4yhZa92Wb7Rkd4XGnw7CCUObVqEwrSzT8qxeRYoPaKMQ8brzkDQM=) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEgmD-YLyGrqj59kQmTDnZfhjdBx6wdtNiZbBD8_z7IOY8AzIZoYe-5JZRsNA_fRSVLV7a88QVXKZu4c8h4KVTc-hzRnNjOM0CYfXKcm65h-WWYCVtjj7vtT-bkynEitvEqRlQF_PJmd6AfkbrY3Xf3J7asm3uXhNN8bR_9JDJ3itQ29EjQXEMiYpznQXsTsXyayDbYBFsVO4SxO-2plBhCBTAQn-U=) [sebastianraschka](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFPAoe4lsB4VALwMkOZnIQhtT2UjlmvZ4CEldTgMVpHwQ0toFKyjhOco8IYj-xYEQWFoI--fuojq7V2Pq8BJgyi66ykMjYu4X5Zgtpcmyx_Wym3ElNzJdBSG96AUh8bMsVqKIMWY3Gb-84QKVHGmv7C0g==2). The reliability of multi-step processes is a key concern, leading to the rise of "bounded autonomy" where agents operate with human oversight for specific tasks [vitalijneverkevic](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.south.cloud.google.com/id/1-7).
*   **Computational Cost and Speed:** Engineered workflows and multi-agent systems can be computationally expensive and slow at inference time [ibm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGnn8AobyM9X3Mn2RBrGSiWhMSjYL6ne1g-ey7IcJBXzCTCXOR-fqG9XsRCNRe0txSf0xrEDeEepdZ4_QH6F_vv3BP-iaE3RaXRTnioPifTOzN3biz7BPLwygewHQ9zp7HaBK79soUtTCvNnAm5QC4=).
*   **Testing and Debugging:** Agent-tool interactions are notoriously difficult to test and debug, with errors potentially disrupting entire workflows [zenml](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFPAoe4lsB4VALwMkOZnIQhtT2UjlmvZ4CEldTgMVpHwQ0toFKyjhOco8IYj-xYEQWFoI--fuojq7V2Pq8BJgyi66ykMjYu4X5Zgtpcmyx_Wym3ElNzJdBSG96AUh8bMsVqKIMWY3Gb-84QKVHGmv7C0g==3).
*   **Security and Privacy:** The security and privacy implications of LLM agent systems are emerging areas of research and concern [github](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFPAoe4lsB4VALwMkOZnIQhtT2UjlmvZ4CEldTgMVpHwQ0toFKyjhOco8IYj-xYEQWFoI--fuojq7V2Pq8BJgyi66ykMjYu4X5Zgtpcmyx_Wym3ElNzJdBSG96AUh8bMsVqKIMWY3Gb-84QKVHGmv7C0g==4).

**Emerging Trends and Future Outlook:**
*   **Smaller, Faster, Smarter Models:** The development of more efficient and compact LLMs is a significant trend [amitysolutions](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFpVvdvoqBPlbQLXLhoXRhouQ51S1o5yPgrJo0-oXgJuYieIMhRN4ZTa_viqkke7hQInq_DTJs4spjW3tpYffzid_DR6zt9c_lXdhJ6VnSt5EyiWIjg8AhA9wNtrBVwOkOwdZS1gThkWJoLmLKLzzHLwxoUMZVzyQ==) [turing](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFiZ8l6ctGWmR4unHiFTiPexhk2iRjc9ioHmI_5utlIft4dV8UUGJrzLn_CGtrnXofoP8IosX60gnJ6I2_KY9W7_npCdWFZDD7K-u8ODctlDP-GQnO3TxjQpuslwnQs-va2k9yRc-DaQAJO).
*   **Agent Architects:** The role of prompt engineers is evolving into "Agent Architects" who design the interactions between AI agents [amitysolutions](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFpVvdvoqBPlbQLXLhoXRhouQ51S1o5yPgrJo0-oXgJuYieIMhRN4ZTa_viqkke7hQInq_DTJs4spjW3tpYffzid_DR6zt9c_lXdhJ6VnSt5EyiWIjg8AhA9wNtrBVwOkOwdZS1gThkWJoLmLKLzzHLwxoUMZVzyQ==).
*   **LLMOps:** The adoption of LLMOps solutions is crucial for managing complex AI systems in production [techdogs](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFPAoe4lsB4VALwMkOZnIQhtT2UjlmvZ4CEldTgMVpHwQ0toFKyjhOco8IYj-xYEQWFoI--fuojq7V2Pq8BJgyi66ykMjYu4X5Zgtpcmyx_Wym3ElNzJdBSG96AUh8bMsVqKIMWY3Gb-84QKVHGmv7C0g==5).
*   **Open-Source Collaboration:** Open-source initiatives are accelerating innovation and accessibility in LLM technology [opendatascience](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHE9kU8kGEPMQbZN4tLAQtj3wNme2tq4hPm4Wz0P2qskrx4zjfVBuCeK7-zkFeqj9tCCwinSN8dmnrZ1ka1z4AnxfD6LwOIoYpjo9_05fgTbKZVSonf-CwyHvop0Xu6oMYB0bPWMY2hrATI2c3bbD9rW3IfVW_dKq5WLUKMxgtna2SvXvR0f-CR) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEZMHSIW4JDOR86DunV2DaQPG2FTxmvpO9kOouUiuKJPNs0EORS5qTSVQG5Q2rRuLuZfPQf30gpqZkqBrEd0mDfduPV3MKGRzTXt8LANn5_DIyTFwl3zYCQyPmCcqjDO1K8LsdL6ziJQW33khm5V-EaVCHxJHGfkBEG3awF6SRVrigD2CviUDMrXFfLL1xd4ssr12COjb_uPvn3bzE9RaxIauM3Fn1l4OXeqPyq3UOEcfN41Kz5pioY).

In summary, 2024 has been a pivotal year for LLM agents, characterized by substantial progress in their capabilities, a strong push towards real-world applications, and ongoing efforts to address their limitations. The field is rapidly advancing, with a clear trajectory towards more autonomous, capable, and integrated AI agents that are expected to become increasingly embedded in daily life and work [forwardfuture](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEUHRzlWbJdgWhB2wgl491dQB9C0fHIPMXsh4YsHHrESoRSrZKQeJQGowolbQCtrIbo0IHeYX7GY2c1kXRC4SwYZK8PVZC-oN8rRsX-Rpk4jXdJhw5c06uSRuD-4xnLXeQjtIL4bU-btzZUOjHfTdo=) [autogpt](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEcO9NRxOzcl9ICppuQaUcefebEuEd2ORMDjxpu-tFRuM6ZWeC7cANMa8X0AzKlZfuRLUUGb7fhzLYpQ5I7krfR1bZ9VuFWZzNRmB0YNwqbP8Fcm0seiN6qxxcNxJ5qn_aTJ4vOwqTnkpHP).

code.doc: Main LLM-facing entrypoint for the research agent. Wrapped with @eval so calls are traced/stored.
code.signature: (question: str, initial_queries: int = 3, max_loops: int = 2, reasoning_model: str = 'gemini-2.5-flash-lite') -> str
code.source:
@eval(name="research_agent")
def run_agent(question: str, initial_queries: int = 3, max_loops: int = 2, reasoning_model: str = "gemini-2.5-flash-lite") -> str:
    """
    Main LLM-facing entrypoint for the research agent. Wrapped with @eval so calls are traced/stored.
    """
    state = {
        "messages": [HumanMessage(content=question)],
        "initial_search_query_count": initial_queries,
        "max_research_loops": max_loops,
        "reasoning_model": reasoning_model,
    }
    result = graph.invoke(state)
    messages = result.get("messages", [])
    return messages[-1].content if messages else ""

Their enhanced reasoning and planning capabilities allow them to break down complex tasks into logical steps, with improved memory systems enabling context retention and learning from past interactions [orq](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFNYexmwExzk13aeII7HqLrWWO2HQVWeSBbUVOL42aZkFYYYqT-l69HyGemfEvNn1kguJ-hnLf92mDl4sqUO9NmE_aMqzSspMUZvAGRXrAak9jvWSl_XbxQqA==) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFe6l_FVXgbHBXE6Asmhr-d0DgC5TZR7u2T-CSX-IL37jfUROB2mst-OYgPWZOxZJWcpn8gGhZtKdsbJO9v5Mj1WftLBh8-6e1B33wjmnWjRGhHtVsventqyMd2e4CdREn4rcoUu5gMgSfX5Fh03UyRsifEK0wgwMaU0hWy4dbjILlVXg==) [getdynamiq](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFGopZ_iRKQUbLkKdL3Ra5qeFTeTQGDKf0-NMVKJ-o5lT-PB7Gzsguanlbd034zAfCChhUKLlTOsArBDbsXFAec0nl6v1s2EI50I0IgaGJCJLLnmAu3XPmmhFvLX87SQafyTIc4iTKNTZ-N3gSVJkEvooQM7uJ6I705bpCxg_VzekSaKD6S).
*   **Tool Integration and Function Calling:** A critical capability is the integration with external tools, APIs, databases, and enterprise systems, allowing agents to perform real-world actions and enhance accuracy. This includes API-based interactions which are more efficient and reliable than simple web browsing [orq](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFNYexmwExzk13aeII7HqLrWWO2HQVWeSBbUVOL42aZkFYYYqT-l69HyGemfEvNn1kguJ-hnLf92mDl4sqUO9NmE_aMqzSspMUZvAGRXrAak9jvWSl_XbxQqA==) [ibm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQEZFm-6qG9eoHVUkDcOgsPRNJ9t_ChG6opEBOSkSVTBYPMPOB9qO0iRAPyEuaKXKQcJ403QLUDrsj6uNxRzDvqnDE1aQd_yJrU90NkDvljcfFQkzkjttyHgqCdWwp9r0gF3kJpidAM66Agqqn57FFSoqpS855hrZ5dnbKjZDX2JfoJosLo=) [nocodestartup](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFmw5hH0r152gp8fGv-oHIET1sWFS7pvfChPUg_GA_1C_InzfOR8qEFlgOmNC_noT_9UEZR4RDEOahZi8BfPt7Ssj2sBoIfgXxstgzrN1VqJbn-J-frrV_MCPn5ZNMjBNR9ZMt7KZ3RgiF0V6omcytK) [getdynamiq](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFGopZ_iRKQUbLkKdL3Ra5qeFTeTQGDKf0-NMVKJ-o5lT-PB7Gzsguanlbd034zAfCChhUKLlTOsArBDbsXFAec0nl6v1s2EI50I0IgaGJCJLLnmAu3XPmmhFvLX87SQafyTIc4iTKNTZ-N3gSVJkEvooQM7uJ6I705bpCxg_VzekSaKD6S) [medium](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGKeYdJ9SmicPaPKdQutyy8YxmN_OgAUquaGsg6BPybLXHpO0I25Xdppnh7OCC4h7F9OpIusrHbPCJu8rTbOwlLDw0T_W0UjkDtpv2dYwDaQJoobJ8Tr4WmpHVomOz40-fUtx5e9GQMUdv-53jRWtXwgW0yg7NziaA2b-PmQ9EybRgJvAd3At0g9KT-er-NRSXkZCGuRrlCvUXZvI-A6TYIOpIcjnGeHBaCL8NlUbo78-o=).
*   **Multimodality and Multi-Agent Systems:** LLM agents are increasingly capable of processing multimodal data (text, images, audio, video) [clarifai](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHMPl0Pr2iIxk6qA0n6YFelHNM1hte__5-KlTJHJZ3hXie6ycgLo6MsMF-jDuIr3AMTwKBxhSdwn1NctlXMIpv3S2Uh9n2GxnpB7w3YwwC65huPWZrceXnV-QWj6NrC-59iBhwhNLHwHZftIAPfr4tUMlhBprHDrRAVRykmqwRQE7UnuHdR06E1AiLjWsfllP7IlawB5ED6TEx-6KJCUFgp75MuWN-w6yW-ahNPQv4=0) [nocodestartup](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFmw5hH0r152gp8fGv-oHIET1sWFS7pvfChPUg_GA_1C_InzfOR8qEFlgOmNC_noT_9UEZR4RDEOahZi8BfPt7Ssj2sBoIfgXxstgzrN1VqJbn-J-frrV_MCPn5ZNMjBNR9ZMt7KZ3RgiF0V6omcytK). To handle complex use cases, multi-agent systems are becoming prevalent, with specialized agents collaborating through frameworks like LangGraph for sophisticated orchestration [towardsdatascience](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHMPl0Pr2iIxk6qA0n6YFelHNM1hte__5-KlTJHJZ3hXie6ycgLo6MsMF-jDuIr3AMTwKBxhSdwn1NctlXMIpv3S2Uh9n2GxnpB7w3YwwC65huPWZrceXnV-QWj6NrC-59iBhwhNLHwHZftIAPfr4tUMlhBprHDrRAVRykmqwRQE7UnuHdR06E1AiLjWsfllP7IlawB5ED6TEx-6KJCUFgp75MuWN-w6yW-ahNPQv4=1).
*   **Continual Learning and Reinforcement Learning:** Research is focused on enabling agents to learn and improve continuously over time, moving beyond static knowledge by learning in "token space" and updating learned contexts [letta](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHMPl0Pr2iIxk6qA0n6YFelHNM1hte__5-KlTJHJZ3hXie6ycgLo6MsMF-jDuIr3AMTwKBxhSdwn1NctlXMIpv3S2Uh9n2GxnpB7w3YwwC65huPWZrceXnV-QWj6NrC-59iBhwhNLHwHZftIAPfr4tUMlhBprHDrRAVRykmqwRQE7UnuHdR06E1AiLjWsfllP7IlawB5ED6TEx-6KJCUFgp75MuWN-w6yW-ahNPQv4=2).
